1122.title: Supergirl Season 2: James Shrinks

11221.content:
James Olsen was no stranger where putting his own life at risk for the greater good was concerned, first helping his best friend Clark Kent for years while he protected Metropolis as Superman. Then most recently helping Kara Danvers discover herself as Supergirl, protecting the citizens of National City from Alien threats and escapees from the Kryptonian prison Fort Rozz.

However, as of late James Olsen was no longer content with just helping Kara and Clark from the shadows and donned his own Identity as a Vigilante operating inside National City without Kara's knowledge. With the help of his friend Winn Schott acting as his ally in his ear, Guardian has been fighting human criminals that went unnoticed by Supergirl and Alien threats that flew under the radar of DEO intelligence.

Now James has established himself as a hero all his own to many of the people of National City, proving that humans although not as powerful as Kryptonians were still capable of defending themselves and their cities. With Kara fighting off larger threats and James clearing the streets of lesser threats National City appeared to have entered an short era of peace, that is until the next big threat comes along to endanger the planet.

Although there was an even bigger threat after Guardian himself, after having Winn patch his phone into the Police radio frequency to receive updates of nearby crimes James got an alert to a break in taking place at the bank only two blocks away. He almost decided to let the police handle it until he read the second half of the alert and saw that it was an alien breaking in.

Realizing the police might have trouble subduing an alien of unknown strength and abilities James suited up and told himself that it would only be a quick job, seeing no real reason to contact Winn on their private comms channel.

Five minutes later he arrived at the scene of the crime full suited up, the front window had been completely smashed in and there were two empty squad cars parked out front with their lights still flashing. Seconds later an alien woman with red skin and green eyes emerged from the bank wearing human clothing, a white shirt paired with a denim jacket, skinny jeans and knee tall boots.

She stared daggers at Guardian as her boots met the street's pavement "Finally, I've heard about someone besides the Kyptonian protecting this city. Now I can finally get revenge for my brother." she said, clearing up that she was actually looking for James.

"Y-Your brother?" James asked, he'd been responsible for locking up plenty of Aliens but non of which looked like she did.

"Yes, now prepare to loss your life." She said, looking James directly in his eyes through the slits in his mask. Suddenly he felt off as if everything in the world was tilting sideways, it took all his strength just to remain standing. Slowly this feeling began to fade, only to be replaced with a new even more odd sensation.

Looking around him it quickly became clear what was happening, he was being shrunk. If he got to small then there no way he'd be a match for this women, he had already lost half his height when she started walking towards him. She would crush him like a bug.

Luckily at that exact moment a sonic-boom could be heard in the skies above them, spooking the alien woman who ran through a nearby alley as James continued to shrink until he was only an inch tall. Then looking up, he watched as Supergirl descended towards the earths surface like some kind of alien goddess, even more now than before because of her increased size from his point of view. Not only was she capable of jumping a thirty story building, she was practically as tall as one too.

The girl of steels boots landed on either side of James with one following shortly after the other, it was dark out and even with the streetlights and the surrounding city lights James was unable to see underneath Kara's famous red skirt. Her face was unfathomably far from him but if she could hear a car crash from a mile away he still figured he'd hear his voice calling out to her.

"Supergirl, down here!" He yelled, his voice still disguised by his mask. He waited a moment before Kara turned from left to right, using her X-ray vision to scan the area for whoever was calling her name. However it wasn't until she looked at her feet that she where the sound was coming from, looking closely it appeared to be some kind of human the size of a bug. Much like a man she met recently during her time on Earth 1 named Ray Palmer, he had a suit that allowed him to shrink and return to normal size at will. But that wasn't who was standing between her feet, no it was Guardian? How did he get so small? What was he even doing here?

She thought about it for only a few seconds before reaching down to pick him up, it's not like she could just leave him to be stepped on or run over by a car. James didn't resist, he trusted Kara as her fingers gently wrapped around his body and lifted him into the air. She'd trained for years to control her unbelievable strength, so the threat of her smashing him to bits between her fingers was small.

What will Kara do next?

1. Gently lift Guardian's mask off to discover it's James, starting off as angry that he'd do something so reckless. Telling him he could've been killed, or worse.

2. The sound of cop cars in the distance provokes Kara to leave the scene of the crime for now with Guardian in tow. Afterwards Kara asks guardian what happened to him and thinks of a way to solve his size problem.

3. Kara reveals that she has known for a while that Guardian was James all along and decides to bring him to the DEO to ask Alex for help in diagnosing why he's shrunk.

11231.title: Supergirl Season 2: Kara Shrinks

112311.content:
Kara Zor El better known to the people of Earth as Supergirl, arrived at the DEO after she’d wrapped up her duties as Kara Danvers. There waiting for her was she adoptive sister Alex Danvers, the Martian Manhunter J’onn J’onzz, and her long time work companion Winn Schott.

“What's on the schedule for today? Raiding a Cadmus facility? Aliens running amok on the streets? Bank Robbery?” Kara asked, anxious to see some action after spend all of her morning and afternoon in front of her computer typing up a new article for the CatCo newspaper.

“Actually Kara we’ve come across some interesting Intel on Cadmus as of late, something I’m sure you’d agree requires your attention.” J’onn J’onzz said, still disguised as Hank Henshaw who they recently discovered was still alive and working for Cadmus under the code name Cyborg Superman.

“Do we finally know exactly where their base is, or where they might be holding Jeremiah?” Kara asked excitedly, thinking that today might finally be the day that she gets to take down the anti alien organization once and for all.

“No, at least not yet.” Alex said from the corner of the room, still hopeful that her Father could be dragged back onto the side of good.

“After your fight with Cyborg Superman the DEO was able to recover a piece of his armor that you managed to chip off his arm. From there I was able to hack into some of their files and discovered that their working on a way to track down any alien living on earth. That includes Kryptonians.”

“So, let them come track me down then. When they do I’ll be ready for a fight.” Kara declared boldly before her team, preparing to leave before she was stopped by her adoptive sister Alex.

“You don’t understand Kara!” Alex yelled, standing up to the Girl of Steel.

“What don’t I understand?” Kara said, taking offensive to Alex’s worry for her safety.

“With this program they can track where you live, they can find out where you work and who you really are. They could oust Kara Danvers as Supergirl and you’re human live would be over. Not to mention the constant threat that they can attack you anywhere in National City, we already know that they don’t care about civilian casualties if it means bringing you down.” Alex explained, but Kara was stubborn as she was powerful.

“I’ll handle it.” was all she had to say before flying off into the sun setting sky towards her home where she could get some rest before tracking down Cadmus tomorrow.

“We can’t let her do this, if Cadmus is able to attack her at any point or place in the day then she could be hurt or worse, that goes double for civilians.” Alex said, turning to J’onn and Winn for support.

“I know, but we can’t stop her. She’s too powerful.” J’onn said, knowing that even he couldn’t subdue Kara if she was that determined to go on as if nothing had changed.

“But what if she wasn’t, there’s always the device in evidence locker #375-7J.” Alex said, turning to J’onn in the hopes that he’d approve what she had planned.

“What device? There’s a device that can beat Supergirl?” Winn asked, surprised that the DEO had such a powerful weapon on hand.

“Certainly not, It could weaken her considerably but not defeat her. We used it once to help contain the larger aliens that escaped Fort Rozz. Are you sure about this Alex?” J’onn briefly explained before questioning Alex.

“Yes, I don’t think we have a choice. We can work on taking down Cadmus’s tracking device in the meantime.” Alex assured, confirming that she was willing to do whatever it took to protect her alien adopted sister.

“Okay, come with me then…” J’onn said solemnly before leading Alex to retrieve the device.

---Next Morning---

Kara awoke happily the following morning, ready to assume her alternate persona as Supergirl and take Cadmus down. However she soon discovered this was easier said than done as she struggled to get out from underneath her blanket.

“Wait a minute…” Kara said aloud, recalling memories from her childhood on Krypton when she was a child. Back in those days she’d struggle every morning to get out of bed, of course that was before the Earth’s yellow sun gave her super strength and the rest of her incredible powers. Did this mean that she’d lost her powers again, or was something else to blame for this strange phenomena?

The answer quickly shifted to the latter as Kara attempted to fly out of her bed, discovering that as she rose up her blanket continued to pull her back down.

“That’s strange.” Kara said under her breath, thinking that her blanket seemed bigger than it usually was for some reason. Although she soon after convinced herself that she must’ve been mistaken, there’s no way her blanket could have grown so dramatically overnight. Be that as it may Kara discovered after finally tossing her blanket to the side that something had caused the opposite to happen to her. Rather than her blanket growing in size, she had somehow been shrunk. The apartment she had lived in for years now made almost unrecognizable by its immense size, everything from her furniture to her socks dwarfing the shrunken Kryptonian. However her possessions weren’t the only things surrounding her that were now gigantic when compared to her.

“Good, you’re finally up.” said a familiar female voice, one that Kara had known for as long as she lived on Earth. Spinning around Kara came to the obvious conclusion that it was Alex Danvers sitting on her bed behind her. She was huge, maybe even as tall as the CatCo headquarters building that she worked at.

“Alex, what’s going on here? Why are you so big, and why am I so small?” Kara asked, placing her hands on her hips promptly expecting an explanation for her current size situation.

“Well, first of I’m not big. You’re just really small, and the reason for that is that I maybe, kinda convinced J’onn to let me shrink you for your own good. Just until we take out the Cadmus alien detection satellite.” Alex explained, hoping it would be easier for Kara to forgive her for shrinking her than it would have been to ask her to willingly go along with her plan.

“What‽ Are you kidding me, what made you think that I’d be okay with this?” Kara yelled, her face turning bright red as she attempted to scold her now giant sister.

“I didn’t think you would, that’s why I had to do it while you were still asleep. Otherwise you might have tried to get away from me and I couldn’t have contained you.” Alex explained, thinking Kara would understand why she had to do this soon enough.

“What do you mean contain me?” Kara asked not liking the way Alex phrased her last words.

“About that, we have reason to believe that the alien detection satellite can see through concrete, steel, and possibly even lead from space. However according to our calculations it can’t detect alien DNA when surrounded by human flesh.” Alex trailed off, preparing herself to say the part of her plan she was sure Kara would like the least.

“Please don’t tell me you plan on putting me between your toes?” Kara asked, half joking and half concerned that she might have been right. Looking down at her sister’s socked feet, Alex was always wearing combat boots so she didn’t imagine that they smelled very nice.

“No, for this plan to work you need to be one hundred percent covered in human flesh. For that reason you’ll be kept safe between my butt-cheeks.” Alex blushed, looking towards Kara who had turned bright red, although for the tiny Kryptonian is was not a reaction from being embarrassed but rather a mix of embarrassment and anger.

“No way, there is no way I’m going anywhere near your giant butt while I’m this small.” Kara said, attempting to fly away. Marking the end of the conversation.

Nevertheless Alex was determined to protect Kara and those she cared about, reaching out and grabbing Kara out of mid air in her fist.

“Hey, what are you doing? Let me go!” Kara yelled, finding herself unable to break free of Alex’s iron like grip. Is this what she was like to normal humans? A powerful supreme being who can easily manhandle their species.

"I'm really sorry about this but you leave me no other choice." Alex stated as she got off Kara's bed and stood up, unbuckling her jeans as the shrunken Kara fought from within her fist like an angry hornet.

Kara only got a peek of what was in store for her as Alex quickly shoved her hand down the back of her pants, worried that Kara might successfully escape if given the opportunity. She then slammed her open palm against her bare right cheek, using her fingers to push Kara between her butt cheeks with ease, clenching them together as tightly as she could to keep her in place while she adjusted herself.

The large spherical orbs of butt flesh overcoming the tiny alien's might with overwhelming power, even after Alex had buttoned and zipped up her jeans they held tight around Kara's body.

Of course Kara wasn't the type of Superhero to go down without putting up a fight, furiously she began attacking Alex's butt flesh while yelling out at her adoptive sister to let her out. Despite that fact she learned that her super strength would not help her here as Alex's flesh absorbed her blows one after another like they were nothing. Alex didn't admit it openly because she knew it wouldn't make Kara feel any better but it actually felt pretty good, almost like she was receiving a tiny massage from the once powerful Supergirl.

Finally Alex walked towards the door, shaking up her butt with each step. This completely negated any progress Kara might have made in escaping her sister's butt, dragging her closer towards Alex's butt hole while she continuously tried her best to escape her massive ass.

Where is Alex going?
112311.title: Concealed Between Alex's Cheeks

1123113.content:
Alex was granted time-off from her job at the DEO while she dealt with Supergirl, deciding to spend her first day off in her usual manner. Spending time with her favorite sister, not that Alex gave Kara much of an option in the matter after forcefully shoving the tiny blonde down the back of her jeans.

She could have stayed at Kara's apartment, but for some reason, she didn't feel welcome after her disagreement with the Kryptonian living there. Deciding to take Kara back to her apartment for a change, where they could still do some of their favorite activities together, such as watching movies.

Although, Kara would still have to stay between Alex's butt-cheeks, so more accurately, she'd be watching movies on top of Kara while sitting on her. The brunette woman laughed at the concept, fully aware that Kara would not be happy with such an arrangement.

Meanwhile, Kara was furious, still pounding away at her adoptive Earth sister's butt flesh with her tiny fists, assuming that she was the cause of Alex's sudden laughter. The short brown-haired woman's rear cheeks still confining Kara's movements to a single area within her butt crack.

Her flesh continued to bully the shrunken Kryptonian with each step as if Kara was no more than a piece of butt lint, trapped until Alex decided to let her out. But, without sunlight, Kara was losing to strength to keep on fighting, and soon found herself overpowered by the twin spheres.

Alex was hardly surprised, expecting that something like this would happen pretty early on after shrinking Kara. Without yellow sunbeams to fuel her otherworldly powers, Supergirl would be as weak as any other human. Still, the brunette agent mourned the loss of her personal butt massager, now that her battery was running low, though it was nice while it lasted.

Then again, Alex knew Kara better than anyone. When backed into a corner, she always managed to find more power. She just needed some motivation. They weren't too far from her place at this point. Surely, Kara could go a few more rounds against the giant buttocks, as a favor for protecting her from the evil organization Cadmus, Alex thought.

Walking down the street, Alex began to tighten her glutes around Kara, able to feel her whole body perfectly within her cheeks. She wasn't just doing it to be mean either, Kara had been attacking her flesh nonstop ever since she placed her inside of her buttcrack, this was simply a way for her to get even.

However, Kara certainly didn't see it this way, as she was entombed in Alex's butt flesh, the malleable cheeks filling every nook and cranny surrounding her tiny form. Kryptonian's still needed air to breathe, so she was left with two options, either continue fighting off Alex's cheeks, or suffocate within them until she passed out.

Always one to fight an uphill battle, Kara pursued the former, clenching her fist tightly and landing a solid blow against Alex's left cheek, not that she could tell her lefts from her rights anymore. Provoking Alex to suddenly tense her cheeks up completely, not prepared for the tiny alien's moon-based assault. But the Girl of Steel would not go down so easily, using all of her muscles to fend off the encroaching walls.

Not wanting to pay to much attention to her ass while they were still in public, Alex continued her walk home. Meanwhile, a reinvigorated Kara continued to furiously massage her Earth-born sister's butt with her fists.

Alex was pleased with herself, thinking of the torture as a little mischief between siblings. It also gave her a rare opportunity to teach Kara a lesson by show of force, if she doesn't want to be attacked by an eighty-foot-tall ass, then she should go picking a fight with it in the first place.

Alex arrived at her apartment, taking a long sigh of relief as she closed the door behind her, leaving the Danver's sisters to their own devices. Allowing Alex the pleasure of talking to Kara, instead of just flexing her butt muscles around the inch tall Kryptonian.

"Okay Kara, we're home. And I know it's a little unorthodox, but I'd still like to have Danver's sister night, even though you're so tiny and I'm sure that you're upset with me over this whole situation. Just know that I'm trying to protect you here, which is also why I can't let you yet. I did appreciate the massage you gave me earlier though, thanks for that." Alex joked, hoping to break the tension.

"Alex! Let me out of here this instant! I don't want to have to resort to more drastic measures! I don't want to hurt you!" Kara yelled at the top of her lungs, her powerful voice tickling Alex's butt causing her to chuckle in response, covering her mouth so as not to embarrass Kara further. But will she see it that way?

What will Alex and Kara do next?

1. Alex upholds her and Kara's usual tradition of having Movie nights together, putting on some of Kara's favorites in the hope that she'll calm down after hearing the familiar sounds.

2. Kara decides that she's had enough of Alex's ass, using some of her other powers in an attempt to escape. Starting with Heat Vision, the only question is how Alex will react when Kara burns one of her butt-cheeks(Second Degree Burn)?

3. Kara continues to try and escape Alex's butt-crack using brute strength, nearly escaping before Alex has to use her hand to push the tiny blonde back into place, but she doesn't stop there, going as far to push Kara into her butt hole in order to keep her safe.
1123113.title: Alex's Apartment

choices: Lena doesn't notice Kara's shrinkng but does her disappearance
Lena watches her friend shrink and the lightbulb goes off in her head (KD=SG)
112312.content:
'Ms Luthor, are you sure this is safe?' Jess asks her as her boss sets up equipment to examine the blue gem like object found in the most recent of Lex's secret cashes. The artifact had been sealed in a lead lined box and only when inventory was being compiled did it get discovered. Once she heard Lena had it sent to L Corp and more importantly her office ASAP, as well as anything she'd need to properly examine and test the mineral

'Yes Jess it's fine, there is a tiny amount of radiation leakage but it's less than a suntan so it'll be completely harmless' the scientist and CEO explained, hoping to calm her long suffering assistant, especially with all the recent activity that kept happening around here, she almost saw Supergirl more than her own assistant if that were possible.

'Yes Miss Luthor, just remember that if you miss lunch that reporter will make her frowny face and pout, seriously that pout should be outlawed' despite her complaint the smirk she as wearing made Lena happy her assistant was no longer at odds with the friend, that had been a big problem

Still that wasn't the issue at the moment, now was her newest problem from Lex, this one was actually quite beautiful for a change, sapphire blue and cut almost like a gemstone Lena almost didn't want to damage the thing, so she did the less evasive tests first.

The material may not be a real sapphire but it was of a high enough quality to be considered a gem, the material was also highly conductive, which gave Lena some ideas if they ever managed to find more of this stuff in some of Lex's other vaults/ hideaways,

Like she said to Jess the radiation was extremely low level and on a very low wavelength, it couldn't do damage to any human being, but given her brother was the previous owner there was a chance another species could be harmed by it, after all the Kryptonian's could be harmed by a green rock, why couldn't something else be harmed by a blue gem (Also green lanterns are harmed by yellow so DC is weird when it comes to colors). The radiation signature didn't match anything on record but she did manage to find a few signs the gem had been synthesized which was good news and bad news: On the one hand it being artificial meant she had no way of knowing what the thing could do or if Lex had altered it's properties, but on the other if she could determine it to be harmless she could make enough to test all those ideas she had forming in the back of her head.

The scans she had taken at least proved it to be a solid structure with no little surprises hidden inside in case of it falling into those her brother and mother would deem the wrong hands (like her own or the DEO's most likely) which was good seeing as one such surprise blew up one of her researchers a couple months back.

A knock at the door snapped her out of her musings and she realized Kara had arrived with lunch, she should probably save Jess from the pout, but first to place the gem back into it's box, Kara may be a good person but she was still a reporter and she can't really say to the blond something is 'off the record' if it's sitting the right in front of her. Ensuring the seal was on tight Lena finally opened the door and Kara scrambled in with bags of food, Jess glaring at her with a face that screamed 'You owe me SOOOO much' and it was true, Lena realized she really needed to give that girl a raise, not just for this but for everything else too.

How Kara could eat so much and still look the way she did baffled Lena, she didn't even eat half as much as the blond and she has had to add half an hour to her exercise routine since becoming her friend. Curse you Kara pouts and her ability to find delicious cakes and other sweet treats.

Conversation flowed easily between them, some days actually reminding her of days before Lex turned out to be a psychopath, when it was just the 2 of them against the world, wanting to make everything better. Sighing at broken dreams she casts a gaze on her latest bit of recovered strangeness from the man, a gesture which did not go unnoticed by miss Danvers

'Hey Lena what you got there?' she asks, Lena not knowing she had tried to peak into the box, but the lead prevented her from knowing anything but the dimensions of the box itself

'You promise not to say anything back at CatCo? Lena asks, knowing Kara would never do such a thing but she was a paranoid woman who people were actually trying to kill, letting her have this piece of mind was the least Kara could do, and the young Kryptonian knew it too.

'Not until you either go public or mention it in one of our interview' she replies almost instantly making Lena smile

'Okay then' she grins and hops up to her desk 'I don't fully know the full capabilities of this thing myself yet but the possibilities are endless once the tests are completed and we can synthesize more of it' she explains with an near visible passion, she really wanted to turn something Luthor made into a force for good and this was one of many chances.

What she didn't know was that while Kara had been following her just as eagerly, no doubt feeding off Lena's enthusiasm, the moment the lid was removed she felt a stabbing pain in her brain and acute loss of her usually perfect balance. 'Shit' Kara swears internally 'Kryptonite' she wonders how Lena could be unaware of how dangerous messing with that mineral was, and also what could happen to her if the DEO found out, but when she saw the blue glow coming from the box she understood: Green was the only really widely known color of Kryptonite, which makes sense given it was always green Lex used against Kal-El, the others being too unpredictable as far as Kara knew to be used effectively as a weapon, Lena simply didn't know Kryptonite came in a literal rainbow set, and it was coming back to bite Kara in the ass, hard.

The blond known as Supergirl panicked when the world started to both recede from her and shoot up above her, it turned out blue was capable of size manipulation, which was news to her (just because she knew there were many different colors of Kryptonite doesn't mean Kara knew what they all did) so she was forced to just stand a little behind Lena as she dwindled away to just shy of an inch tall, at which point the disorientation seemed to dissipate, it seemed her smaller body had reached the limited range of Blue Kryptonite, or at least of a piece that size. Staring up her friend was practically a goddess now, this was not going to be a fun day.

The question was, did Lena see any of that? Did she see the effect blue Kryptonite had on Kara?

1. She had been turned away at the time, so when she turns back to ask Kara that she thought the woman was 'gone' or at least that was how it looked (Kara has to try get her attention somehow)

2. She turned to ask her thought just as Kara began to shrink, the Kryptonian too disorientated to notice Lena watching her disappear, only when she reached a couple inches tall did Lena snap out of her daze/shock long enough to close the lid and stop the Kryptonite effecting her, because she realized both what her brother had made, and who her best friend was.

Alex smirks a little as she strips off her main work clothes, loving the feel of the skin tight, rubber-esque outfit against bare flesh, looking in the mirror if there was ever a moment she felt like a super spy it was right now, even drew attention to her butt like she presumed these kind of costumes were designed. She then reapplied her other clothes, as while nice, the suit was also eye catching in a bad way at normal size, and if she was going to pull this off she needed to be normal size first, then shrink when she got closer.

Alex glares as she looks at the massive Luther..... L-Corp building. Kara seemed to think it's current owner was good, but you could never be sure with these kinds of people, always having an angle, waiting for the moment to stab you in the back. Speaking of back Alex chuckles a little at he mental joke before sneaking in the back door and moving swiftly until she reached the main elevators undetected by staff or camera. Knowing enough about places like this to know the boss was on the top floor Alex pushed the button, then once it was contently making it's way up activated the suit, The feeling of shrinking was definitely just as strange as she expected, but Alex was able to avoid any major issues as she had the elevator to herself until it dinged at the top floor.

Jess was confused when the elevator doors opened but nobody stepped out, confused but as there was literally nothing she could do, Lena's PA went back to making sure her schedule actually could be accomplished and that the woman was able to sleep a number of hours for a normal person, rather than burn herself to the ground.

Still at least she was alone with Lena and undetected by a woman probably more paranoid than her and Oliver Queen combined. Plus this suit was awesome, everything was coming up Danvers

"Miss Luthor, Kara Danvers is outside your door with lunch, can I let her in before I start fighting her for the food?" Crap, Kara being here is going to mess everything up, there was no way Lena was going to do anything bad around Kara, the girl was after all naïve but not stupid.

"Send her in" Lena replies, standing just as Kara walks in the door with 2 bags of food, shaking the right one in the ravenette's direction "Hello Kara"

"Hey Le, Jess says you're not eating enough or sleeping, so I decided to deal with the one I actually can do something about, by bringing you food" the blond chirp, and Alex watches Lena smile before hugging her sister, this was still unhelpful, and also distracting as it wasn't until the shadow overwhelmed her Alex realised Lena was heading for the same seat she was on... and about to sit on it

Unable to escape Alex's day goes from trying to expose Lena's secrets to spending time with Kara's toes in her work heels and later Super boots
3) Alex dodges Lena's ass and hits the ground, but not without drawing attention to herself, both women first think it's a bug and soon after a tiny intruder/spy. This wasn't going to end well for little Alex

Now open wide'

Kara glares before spitting in Reign's face, the Worldkiller twitches, places the vial on the ground by her hip and proceeds to grab Kara's head and slam it into the ground, until the Kryptonian was seeing stars, her head lolling around as her eyes and brain try to regain focus. During this time she feels Reign turn her head to face her as well as part her lips, allowing her to pour the entire contents of the vial down her throat. She could blame the dizziness on the multiple concussions (is that even possible) Reign gave her, but even her idled mind could feel Reign getting heavier, see her get larger... no Reign was staying the same, Kara was getting smaller

'There we go, not a problem any more' Reign whispers when the process ended, picking up the 4 inch Kara just before standing to her full height 'Weak, powerless, quite literally so in fact, it's not even really worth killing right now. At least you'll be able to witness your world desolated by my hands, only then will I kill you slowly, until then, well, you're about to be what a lot of humans consider a lucky bastard' she smirks at Kara's confused expression before it morphs into fear 'Exactly, now don't squirm too much, or you might wake up a hungry quim' she teases before pulling open the front of her suit, exposing her large breasts in a tight bra, shoving her in upside down so that most of her upper body was pinned under her right breast, and her legs were splayed by the brunette's nipple between her legs.

Reign bites her lip as she readjusts her suit, she wasn't entirely honest with her new captive, yes she would love to kill her slowly, probably by crushing her limbs and eating the rest, but she did't have the time, she could feel Sam's subconscious fighting to return to the surface, she needs to make sure nothing is out of place besides some lost time, that way she can chalk it up to exhaustion and leave it alone rather than try investigate. Which was why once Supergirl was restrained she shot up into the air, heading straight for L Corp

20 minutes later

Sam woke with a start 'Ow did I pass out again?' she groans, rubbing her neck and wincing at the crick that had formed before checking the time on her laptop 'Fuck 3 hours? Why didn't anyone wake me? Lena? Jess even?' she rubbed her eyes and groans into her hands.

Kara blinks cobwebs from her brain as she hears the sound of the giantess she was trapped on, only it wasn't Reign, it was her friend Sam, this is brilliant, the two got along rather well (not as well as either did with Lena but they still thought of each other as good friends) so there was no way she'd ignore Kara's pleas for help, she just needed to get Sam to notice her and free her from her nice smelling, fleshy prison. So going against Reign's order Kara began to wriggle and squirm, hoping Sam would notice quickly

What now?

1) Kara's wriggling gets Sam's attention, but also excites her. What could Sam possibly do with a helpless Kryptonian, that was just rubbing herself against her breast?
2) Sam remembers Lena invited her over for drinks tonight, a day away from work and Ruby (she made a mental note to text Alex a thanks for minding Ruby), so in her rush she doesn't feel anything, attributing Kara's attempts at getting her attention as her own movements. What follows is some heavy drinking by both Sam and Lena... is Kara really sure this is the best time or situation to make herself known?
11311.title: Shrunken by Reign

11312.content:
Kara was flying through National City, doing her usual Supergirl patrol, when she heard a girl calling for help. Following the sound, she made her way into a warehouse, but instead of finding a girl she found a doll.

'This can't be good' she mutters picking up the doll, which then releases a high pitched shriek, bringing the Kryptonian to her knees and eventually causing her to pass out.

Some time later

Kara groans as she comes to, surprised when she saw that she was being quite thoroughly restrained by regular looking cuffs and ropes, despite no kryptonite that she could see or feel. Tugging she was shocked and a little afraid when she couldn't even get any wriggle room, never mind shred it like it was made of wet paper

'Try all you want, it's not going to work" a female voice says through the darkness, the amusement clear as day before she steps into the light and reveals herself

"Jaqueline Nimball!" Kara gasps "But you should be in Van Kul!"

The blond chuckles "True, but during the last rampage, you and Reign caused a portion of the building collapsed, allowing several inmates, myself included to escape rather easily. Now I have a very special plan for you doll, but first I thought you deserved an explanation. When some very powerful people managed to discover my plans, they were very interested and gave me something that would make sure I succeeded, I believe the robot called it, Gold Kryptonite" Kara's blood ran cold, she knew exactly what it was and what it's effects were "Anyway, while you were sleeping I put it somewhere safe on your person, and by the time anyone finds you, it effects will be permanent, no more Supergirl"

Kara tries to find something to hope for "But the DEO will find me, quite easily in fact given I haven't checked in."

Jaqueline nods 'True, if I had planned to keep you here. Oh no, this is just the prep room." she says in response to Kara's fearful gaze, before pulling out a small device "Now this grenade contains a very powerful paralytic gas, would normally work for several hours, but when I'm done with you the concentration should last a few days at least." she grins before putting on a gas mask and pulling the pin, a thick green smoke filled the room and Kara begins to wheeze and cough, closing her eyes to keep out the added pain. 'oh no you don't' even muffled she could still here Nimball "You get to watch it all!" she hears as her eyes are forced open.

Once Kara was incapable of conscious movement Jaqueline unties her and begins setting to work posing and prepping her, molding her facial muscles to form her signature smile as well as move her arms into her version of the Superman pose. Kara felt humiliated but it wasn't as if she had a choice in the matter.

'There we go, the doll is complete." Nimball claps before stepping out of view, returning with a sci-fi laser and a plastic shell for a Supergirl doll, Kara not needing an explanation really to uncover the plan. It didn't surprise her (though against her best efforts did amuse her) when the laser gun had the classic sound effect when it fired, the beam shrinking Kara to the size where she'd fit perfectly in the doll case... as intended. She was glad Kryptonians needed less air than humans right about now as she was sealed into the container and dropped into Jaqueline's bag, darkness consuming her.

When she was finally released Kara noticed it was evening and they were in the toy store near her apartment, which only partly confused her until Nimball started talking again

"Look at this doll, all your perfect little sisters" she coos, picking up a Supergirl doll from the display to show her, Kara hated to admit it but they had done a spot on job with capturing her likeness, just sucks it happens a little while before she becomes the size to be mistaken for one "You know I like this one better, doesn't death glare me, I think I'll keep her." she puts the doll into her bag before looking at Kara again "But we can't have the theft known, guess I'll be returning this one." she frowns just before placing Kara on the shelf alongside all her other doubles. Screaming in her mind to be set free as the new Toy Maker walks away.

Soon morning arrives and Kara tries to make herself known, but the only thing she was able to move was her eyes which didn't exactly draw much attention unless they were looking directly into them. Just when she begins to lose hope she hears a familiar voice

"Supergirl dolls?" It was Sam, a mutual friend of Lena's that Kara had recently become friends with, she was a really good person, same as her daughter Ruby, they would help her, but her heart sank when she was picked up and rather than acknowledged was simply pressed against the brunette's chest as she made her way through the crowded store, paid for the shrunken hero and headed back to her car.

"Ruby, I got you something!" Sam calls when she enters the house, grinning when she hears her daughter's thunderous steps from one end of the house to the other

"Really mom, what you get me? Is it something cool?" Ruby asked.

Sam smiles 'That's up to you I guess' she says, passing Kara over to her

"No way, you got me a Supergirl doll? Thanks, mom" Ruby grins widely, hugs Sam and runs off into her room, tearing the packaging off her idol's doll so they can play together.

What next?

1) Ruby decides Supergirl needs a secret identity so gives her a disguise (whether she removes the suit and see's her doll's a lot more lifelike than she should, or simply puts doll clothes over the suit like Kara does quite often, is up to the uploader)

2) About a week later Kara begins to be able to move again but isn't sure she wants to return to her real life: sure being used by a little girl was embarrassing at times but she felt important. Plus both Kara Danvers and Kara Zor-El's lives sucked, they had so much pain with no end in sight. Ruby's Supergirl doll just had to pray she was played with most days so as not to get bored, no other responsibilities for the first time since she left Krypton Kara felt free.

3) Kara is able to move again and surprises Ruby as she discovers her Supergirl toy is the real thing. however, Ruby still wanted to play with her and instead of letting her go forces Supergirl to play with her. Kara tries using her powers to escape but this somehow causes her to shrink further to 1 inch tall
11312.title: Ruby's New Doll

113123.content:
Sixteen hours had passed since Kara was first afflicted by Nimball's paralytic gas and the effects had finally begun to fade. Meanwhile Ruby raced upstairs to her room with her new Supergirl doll under her arm, blissfully unaware that what she was carrying was the genuine article.

"Ruby, Dinner will be ready in 1 hour!" Sam called from the kitchen, happy to see her daughter so excited by the gift she brought her.

Kara tried breaking free of her constraints, but the elastic bands around her wrists and ankles proved more effective than she had anticipated at keeping her in place. At most she could turn her head, wiggle her toes, and curl her fingers into a fist, but she couldn't break free.

It was probably for the best though. Sam told Ruby that they would be eating dinner within the hour. Kara only had to pretend to be a doll until then, after Ruby left her alone she could fly out the window and head towards the DEO. It wouldn't be all bad, but with the gas wearing off it would prove increasingly difficult to stay perfectly still and not show any emotion.

*Wumpth*

Ruby slammed the door to her room, sealing Kara inside with the fifty foot tall Ruby. She jumped onto her bed, bouncing on her knees as she placed the box on top of her legs. Kara remained still, trying not to show any emotion as the giant preteen girl looked down at her.

"Wow, so cool! They got all the details right. She almost looks alive." Ruby said excitedly, peeling the top off of the cardboard box. Fresh air rushing into the packaging, washed over Kara and sending a chill up her spine. She didn't show any form of response, gritting her teeth while she continued smiling at Ruby.

"These weak little rubber bands, can't hold back Supergirl." Ruby giggled, removing them one by one very quickly, even snapping one of them in the process leaving Kara shocked. In her shrunken state, she was so weak that she had trouble escaping a rubber band that Ruby could break without even trying. Was this twelve-year-old stronger than the Girl of Steel?

"Okay, let's get a better look at you now," Ruby announced, maneuvering her hand inside of the box around what she thought was a doll, making a tight fist around Supergirl's waist and abdomen as she pulled her out of the container. The young girl had a grip stronger than any alien Kara had faced before, making it difficult for the superheroin to breath as she tried to continue her doll routine. Unfortunately, it was not one she could keep up for long as Ruby's curiosity leads her to inspect her new belonging.

"They captured her face perfectly, and the body almost feels real," Ruby said aloud, glancing at all the little features on the six-inch tall Supergirl as she tried to remain tense until Ruby did something unexpected. Kara felt embarrassed as Ruby lifted the back of her skirt, revealing her plain white panties to the younger girl. "That's weird. You think they would make these match the rest of her costume." Ruby said, delivering a swift flick to Kara's backside.

"Hey! What do you think you're back there?" Kara asked loudly, coming to life suddenly and spooking Ruby into dropping her onto the bed. Her shrunken form bounced off the mattress, landing her smack dab in the middle of Ruby's shadow.

"Wait, did you just talk?" Ruby asked, confused by what was going on. Why was her Supergirl doll talking to her? Was it a toy robot or something? No, she moved to independently for that to be true.

"Yes. Ruby, I need you to listen to me. I'm the real Supergirl. I was shrunk to this size by Jacqueline Nimball, a villain who worked with the Toyman earlier this year. She escaped from Van Kull and captured me in an ambush yesterday." Kara explained, but Ruby was still awestruck by the fact that her idol was now smaller than her foot.

"Wait, how did you know my name?" Ruby asked, followed by a moment of silence from the shrunken Supergirl. Unable to come up with an answer that didn't reveal her secret identity. Luckily, Ruby didn't dwell on this question for long before getting back to the issue at hand.

"Oh no, what can I do to help?" Ruby asked, eager to be of some assistance in what she assumed was Supergirl's darkest hour. Ruby jumped off her bed, her feet hitting the wooden floor with a powerful *thud* that Kara could feel shaking the bed under her. Finally Ruby turned around, looking down at the tiny woman from an even greater height than earlier.

Kara, unfortunately, was growing tired of being looked down upon, flying up to Ruby's head so they could have a face to face conversation. "Ruby, it's too dangerous. You could get hurt. Just open the window, and I'll take care of the rest." Kara said confidently, at least with as much confidence a six-inch tall woman could.

"I don't know if that's the best idea," Ruby said, worried about Supergirl's safety in a world built for people several larger than herself.

"Wait, what do you mean? You can't just keep me here like this!" Kara objected, interrupting Ruby before she could finish her thought.

"No, that's not it at all. I don't want to see you get hurt out there. I was going to say we should get Guardian to look into it. He could track Nimball down and figure out how to return you to normal. Then, wait a minute, are you, getting smaller?" Ruby asked, stopping in the middle of a convincing argument as she realized that Kara was only two-thirds of the size she was earlier.

Now at only four inches tall, Kara realized that Ruby was right as she started shrinking a second time. Watching from the air as Ruby seemed to double in size as she dwindled further to only three inches tall. "What's happening to me?" Kara asked in a panic. She hadn't shrunk in the last day, what was different now. Could it be that the box Nimball put her in was a containment field that kept her from shrinking more? No, she would have noticed it sooner. That's when it hit her, and Ruby who is a smart girl also figured it out.

"I think it's your powers! Using them must be causing you to shrink again." Ruby pointed out, while Kara continued to get even smaller. Now ruby was three times larger than when she first encountered her today, but she couldn't stop flying at this height. She'd fall to the floor at Ruby's feet, and with her Kryptonian powers acting up she might get hurt.

Luckily Ruby came to her rescue, laying her hand out under her and allowing Kara to land in the center of her palm like a firefly. Kara continued shrinking after that for a few moments longer, stopping at only one inch tall, only one-sixth the size she was when she arrived at Sam and Ruby's house.

"Wow, now you're super tiny," Ruby said, amazed by how small Supergirl had become right in front of her. Though it hardly helps raise Kara's morale about her current situation.

"I'm sorry, but there's no way I can let you go now. You can't fly, and somebody might step on you if you try to walk wherever you're going. National City needs you, so until then you can stay with me and I'll keep you safe for a few days. Hopefully, you'll grow back given some time to rest." Ruby reasoned, it was a good plan, but it was also one the Girl of Steel couldn't accept lying down.

"No, I can't do that! I won't let you keep me here!" Kara yelled, objecting as loudly as she could at her size. Standing up as she prepared to tell Ruby to release her out the window if she wasn't going to help her. Hoping that at top speed she could fly to the DEO and get Alex's attention before she became microscopic.

"I'm sorry Supergirl, you've given me no other choice," Ruby said, regretfully closing her hand into a fist around Supergirl. Squeezing her tightly without any attempt to restrain herself in case the shrunken Kryptonian was still strong enough to break free.

"Ruby, wha-what are you, doing?" Kara asked, pausing between some of her words as she found it hard to breathe all of a sudden, struggling to move the giant girl's fingers apart.

"I have to keep you safe, I promise I'll let you go at the end of the week if you get any bigger, But for now I'll keep you safe. And since I can't have you trying to run off, I'll have to keep you_________." Ruby said, shocking Kara with her choice of where she wanted to keep her.

1. "...inside of my sock." Ruby slips off one of her socks and could either decide to drop Supergirl inside or stuff her between her toes thinking that might be safer for her. She could also put on a pair of sneakers or Ugg boots as an added layer of protection and warmth.

2. "...between my buttcheeks." Ruby knows this isn't a preferred spot for Kara, but assures her that it will be a safe and soft place to live out her days while shrunk where she can keep an eye on her.

3. "...here with me and my mom." Ruby brings Kara downstairs and tells her mom everything that happened. Telling her she wants to keep Supergirl safe, suggesting they call Alex. Will Reign take over before she gets the chance? Will she call Alex? Or Will she say that Supergirl should spend a few days with them first?
113123.title: Ruby's Little Supergirl

1131233.content:
"You'll just have to stay here with me and my mom" Ruby says with a smile, Kara too shocked to respond when she closes her fist and runs back to the main room where Sam had just finished clearing away the other things she'd gotten in the shop "Mom, Mom, Supergirl needs our help" she yells, Sam smiles and rolls her eyes

"Someone's having lots of fun already, and what is Supergirl's emergency?" she asks, her eyes widening when Ruby opens her hand to reveal the tiny Supergirl "Oh, you meant the real Supergirl"

"Not just that, she was my doll, but then she woke up and when she tried to fly away she got smaller" Ruby explains, not clenching her hand around Kara as her mom's eyes were locked on the tiny hero so she had no chance to escape "She tried to go after the woman who shrunk her but we need to keep her safe, she should stay with us" she suggests, grinning up at Sam who smiles

"I don't know Ruby, this might now be the best plan for your little friend" Sam replies, though can't seem to help the slight curl of her lip forming a dark smirk, sending shivers down the blond's tiny spine

Ruby frowns "Well can we give her to Alex then, she might be able to do something to help, she does seem to be in the same place as Supergirl all the time"

Sam frowns as she ruffles Ruby's hair "You are a smart girl, but Alex is out of town for the week, something top secret and very important"

"So important she won't tell her girlfriend?" Ruby pouts/teases, Sam swotting her forehead in response

"She's not my girlfriend. Anyway, Supergirl isn't really an FBI issue, she's not an anywhere issue" for once Kara curses the DEO's secret organisation 'we don't exist' stick, as it was currently biting her in the ass, as was Alex heading to Washington to ask Marston to send help dealing with the Reign issue, preferably someone less of a dick than General Lane had been.

"So what will we do then mom?" Ruby asks, looking down at a Supergirl clearly lost in thought/her own head "We can't just let her go, she'll get hurt, even more so now she's extra tiny" she points out, Kara frowning as her size and vulnerability is once more brought up.

Sam nods "True, we can't have National City's hero go out in the world all by herself" she hums, picking Kara off of her daughter's hand and bringing her up to her face "Hmm. I guess we have no choice but to keep her for now"

"You don't need to do that" Kara partly soothes, partly begs Sam, but Ruby's cheers may have drowned it out for the most part, as Sam just grin at her and chuckles

"Sorry Supergirl, but I can't in good conscience let you leave this house in your current condition. Therefore you'll be staying with us until either your height returns, or Alex comes back from her whatever, which is later in the week. Try escape and I will punish you" she lays down the law, full mom voice and everything, Kara shivers and nods "Great, now to explain what we're going to do"

1) Sam decides the best thing to do to stop escape is keep Supergirl close to heart, pinned between her large breasts and silky bra, Kara has nowhere to go. Sure if Reign bubbles to the surface of Sam's mind she was toast, but the supervillain was never the most regular of consistent of her enemies, so it is possible Reign doesn't show up for a couple days, she can only hope

2) Sam decides it was best for Supergirl and them not to treat Kara like anything other than another houseguest, besides stopping any escape attempts of course. During this time Kara is conflicted, they were basically keeping her prisoner, stopping her from helping people or getting grown back, but on the other, they were treating her like a normal, albeit tiny person, like she was a human, rather than a superhero

3) Sam worries Kara's size problem won't just 'go away' on it's own, so she enlists the help of someone who might be able to do something about this condition, Lena Luthor. Is Kara about to get a helping hand from her friend, or will she be the missing ingredient she needed to find a way to deal with Reign?
1131233.title: Sam's Empathy or Reign's Wrath?

1141.content:
How the Girl of Steel downsize?

1) Red Daughter goes rogue in "The House of L" (Season 4, Episode 16) and decides to replace Kara outright, shrinking her down and stuffing her miniaturized progenitor in her bosom so she can tell Red how to best pass off as Kara. Though Red won't be willing to overlook the tiny Kara's attempts to sabotage her or warn her friends that something is up.

2) After working late at CatCo one evening, Kara crashes for the night. When she wakes up, she finds herself, somehow, shrunken down, powerless and on the chair of the approaching Nia Nal, tumbling down into her protege's gargantuan ass cheeks.

3) Something else. Maybe Eve took the initiative and shrunk the Girl of Steel? Or a malfunctioning transmat portal spat Kara out at doll size in her mother's quarters at Argo City? Or Rao knows what else.
1141.title: Supergirl Season 4: Kara Shrinks

11411.content:
"That's what this is about." Red (for it will be convenient to refer to her as such) realized. "This is about Lena."

Lex remained silent for a moment before he regarded the Kryptonian clone "I thought you were stronger... but... people disappoint."

"Yes. They do." Red agreed before her eyes began glowing a brilliant shade of blue and the ship went up in flames. Only one being survived the explosion and Red, ignorant of the evil she'd just extinguished, was left to decide her fate. Going back to Kaznia, except to collect her books, was an unappealing prospect at best. Going to America had its prospects, though as a conqueror or a citizen she wasn't sure, but the obstacle of Kara Danvers was one that had to be dealt with and Red couldn't say that she'd win a straight up fight. She could just leave the planet outright. Find a new home somewhere else in the galaxy.

It was as she flew over the Indian Ocean that the idea came to her. Flying off to one of Lex's hidden bases, she quickly found the information that she was looking for. A way to slide into a peaceful life and get rid of Kara Danvers.

It was a slow day in STAR Labs of Earth-1 when a breach opened up and Red Daughter sailed out. "Barry." She nodded "I need you to contact the Atom. I need some shrinking tech."

"Ok but you know I'm Cisco right?" The unamused meta asked.

"Sure." The Kryptonian lied, cursing Lex's incomplete research. Still after forty hellish minutes (what sort of idiots could be late with a time machine?) having to take in STAR Labs' frankly bizarre smells, she had the technology that she needed.

"Need any help?" Barry asked.

"No." Red said bluntly.

"You sure? I don't mind." Barry smiled.

"Yeah we can come as well." Sara said.

"You're not gonna take no for an answer are you?" Red asked to which they shook their heads. "Well Kara is very lucky to have you as friends." She said as her heat vision began to charge.

---Next Morning, Earth-38---

Kara let loose a yawn as she prepared to take on the day. As she woke up, she rolled over onto her front and got on all fours. "Wait. That's not right."

"Oh it is now." Kara heard a very familiar voice say.

"Wait whaaaaaaa-" Kara trailed off as she came face to face with a gigantic version of herself. "Who... what... are you?" Supergirl asked as she floated up to the giant's eye level.

"Well I don't really know that," Red confessed "But I'm going to be Kara Danvers."

"Sorry what?" The inch tall girl asked.

"It's simple really. I hated all of Lex's rules and desired an easy American life. But you were in the way."

"LEX?!" Kara asked.

"Yes but I killed him. So I went to Earth-1 and got the tech to shrink you of the way."

"And what's to stop me from getting the tech to grow me back?" Kara challenged, eyeing the breaching device on the table.

"Well I killed Earth-1 as well." She said it so casually that Kara had to do a double take. Unfortunately, this allowed Red to seize her miniature progenitor.

"What are you doing?" Kara asked, her shrunken down strength useless against Red's fully sized counterpart.

"I need to know who to act like Kara Danvers. So you are going to tell me." With that Red pulled down her shirt. Kara gulped as she took in her doppelgänger's gigantic bosom before she found herself stuffed into it.

"Let me out of here!" Kara protested as she pounded and struggled against the soft flesh. Much to her surprise, the breasts were instantly pulled apart allowing her safe passage. "Oh." But before Kara could do anything, the breasts slammed back into her.

"What the hell?"

"You misbehave. I slam my breasts into you." Red said casually as she got ready for a day at CatCo. "Want me to do it again?"

"Yes." Kara said bluntly. Shrugging, Red repeated the act. "Again." Kara said, to Red's confusion. After a few more times, the clone got wise. "You... you're getting some sick sexual thrill of this aren't you?" The ex-Kaznian asked looking down into her bosom.

"I may be Supergirl but I'm still a girl. I have needs."

"Well then I just won't do it." The clone smiled causing Kara's face to drop.

"Maybe we can-"

"Whoops gotta run." Red smiled, snapping her shirt shut as she flew off.

1) Red doesn't quite manage to stick the landing at CatCo, sending Kara tumbling into the front of her clone's panties, introducing Red to a new, and rather exciting, feeling.

2) As Red flies, an emergency calls her off-course. In solving the crisis, she gets turned upside down, allowing Kara to slide out. With her usual hang outs known to Red, Kara tries to sneak back to Midvale to hide.
11411.title: Red Takeover

11412.content:
On one of the highest floors of the CatCo media building, a blue and red form lazily drifted into the darkened office and plopped down on one of the chairs. Though it was not uncommon for the reporters to sometimes come in on the weekend, this was long past the usual hours they'd be around. But for this particular reporter, competing time demands had made it inevitable.

With a groan, Kara Zor-El massaged her temples as her aching body healed itself. She loved her cousin, she truly did, and she so happy that being on Argo allowed him to experience Kryptonian culture but did he honestly couldn't have chosen a worst time to leave the planet. What with the changes at the DEO, the White House, and the rising anti-alien sentiment, she had her hands full 24/7 as Earth's bringer of hope and defender.

Not to mention having spent her Sunday night having been ruthlessly pounded by a steroid fuelled Aquarian. With everything she'd had to, she was days behind on her article.

And perhaps more importantly, there was a steroid fuelled Aquarian running around.

"7000 words and I've written 7." Kara groaned rubbing her eyes. "And I'm not even at my desk. I'm at Nia's." She mumbled looking over at her desk, and all the documents she'd requested for her work. "Why does Nia have speed dial on her phone? Who does she need to call in a rush?"

Objectively, Kara knew she had to walk over to her desk but she was so spent from the fight that she had to rest for a moment. "Just five minutes. Oh I wish I could just wake up tomorrow and not have to worry about being Supergirl." The Girl of Steel muttered.

As the old saying goes, one should be careful what they wish for lest they get it. Like how wishing for a break from the monotony can lead to spending three hours having your head being bashed into the pavement by a steroid fuelled Aquarian.

About nine hours later, Kara let loose a powerful yawn before she stood up, stretching out the cricks in her joints. "Wait. That's not right. I was sleeping on a chair." Opening her eyes, Kara quickly saw that she was still on the chair. There was just one little difference.

Her.

Everything else was still exactly the same but she'd somehow dropped down to an inch in size.

"Well... this is not good." She muttered as she heard the elevator open and her gigantic colleagues walk in.

"Alright. Calm down. You've been through worse. Probably." She spoke to herself. "Basic inventory first. Arms. Legs. Hands. All there. Now you just need to reverse this. Maybe try and call Ray Palmer. He might-" Kara trailed off as her world became enveloped by darkness.

Swallowing a lump in her throat, Kara turned around to see Nia Nal's meteor sized ass descending towards her. "Oh you've gotta be-" With force equal to a meteor, Nia's ass slammed onto the chair, knocking down the miniaturized Kryptonian. Disoriented by the impact, Kara had no time to escape the soft fabric of the chair giving way to the Naltorian's butt and herself sliding down into the crack.

"Again. Been through worse. Probably." Kara chanted to herself as she placed each of her hands on Nia's cheeks and tried to take flight only to remain stuck in place, her tiny feet squished between the soft flesh and the gravity of the Naltorian interfering with her flight. "Damn Nia. What size are your panties? Is this what happens to humans who spend their lives at a desk?"

Kara shook away the thought before she put all her energy into her arms, pushing the giant cheeks away from each other enough so that she could use her legs and have them plant themselves on the butt, pushing the massive cheeks further away.

"Yes." Supergirl smiled as she prepared to take flight, only for both cheeks to violently slam back into her, burying her in their soft flesh. "What the hell?" Kara choked out as she pushed the cheeks apart again. But just like last time, the glutes resumed their initial position the instant she let go of them.

"I'm strong enough to keep them apart but not fast enough to fly away in time?" She whispered in shock. The thought was more than enough for her to start pounding Nia's buttcheeks relentlessly, all but begging the brunette to feel her and let her out. Unfortunately, all the brunette felt was a cold breeze across her behind. Something she rectified by subconsciously adjusting her skirt and cutting off some of the Kryptonian's light.

"Damn it." Kara cursed, leaning against the right butt-cheek.

12111.content:
***"Hi, my name is Barry Allen and I am the fastest man alive. I use to be an ordinary forensic scientist working with the SCPD then one day an accident made me the impossible. Now I work in secret with the help of my new friends at S.T.A.R Labs using my speed to fight crime and help find others Metahumans like me. I am the Flash!"***

Almost a year has passed since the notorious explosion of S.T.A.R Labs Particle Accelerator which lead to the rise of countless Metahumans, but it also gave birth to Central City's greatest hero. Since then Barry and his team have neutralized threats to Central City such as Clyde Martin, Danton Black, and Kyle Nimbus. Every adversary forcing Barry to push his speed to greater and greater heights.

In reality Barry and his team understood little about his powers including what pushing them to their maximum could be causing inside his body, it's for that very reason that Dr. Caitlin Snow saw it fit to call Barry into the laboratory for a routine physical.

For the Flash a routine checkup with Dr. Snow meant running a few hundred miles on Cisco’s specialized speed treadmill clocking in about 657 miles per hour as a standard pace. With each battle Barry only seems to get faster and faster, which was the cause for Caitlin’s alarm in the first place.

During the better half of an hour Caitlin noticed no discrepancies in Barry Allen’s health, his vitals were well within the parameters for someone like him. But since modern medicine had yet to study Metahumans Caitlin decided that prolonged tests were necessary until she could be sure that Barry’s powers came with few side effects aside from an overclocked metabolism and the inability to get drunk.

Then at the height of the hour S.T.A.R Labs experienced a power surge, much like the one that occurred during the Particle Accelerator event. However this time it was worth noticing that the water in her glass began to levitate in mid air, much like the scene Barry described the night his mother Nora was murdered. Caitlin turned to the screens in a panic, Barry’s vitals were dropping faster with each passing second, meanwhile his speed steadily decreased.

She tried looking inside the lab for visual confirmation that Barry was okay but saw nothing aside from a layer of white smoke fogging the glass. The bioengineer jumped to her feet and ran into the lab to check in on her patient, opening the door first thinking that Barry had completely vanished into thin air. Felicity was right, Barry had run so fast that he’d turned to dust inside his costume, except for the fact that the costume was also missing.

*Meanwhile in Barry’s POV*

The last thing Barry remembered was running tests for Caitlin Snow when suddenly the room was enveloped in a thick mist. He almost worried that Nimbus might have escaped the pipeline and was trying to kill him again before realizing that the mist was non-toxic.

Barry jumped off the treadmill and made a run for the down, thinking only of saving Caitlin from the smoke before anything else went wrong. However he didn’t realize that something far worse than a little smokescreen was going on here.

He heard to door open and followed the sound of Caitlin’s voice as she called his name “Barry! Barry, where are you?” she yelled, her voice piercing the speedsters eardrums.

“Caitlin, I’m right here.” Barry answered, thinking Caitlin was only a few feet in front of his face. Little did he know that he was only partially correct in his assumption.

“Barry, can you hear me?” Caitlin called out again, seemingly ignorant to Barry’s response to her concern. Then from the smoke appeared a shadowy figure in front of Barry, which he at first assumed was Caitlin walking towards him.

“Caitlin, there you are.” Barry said, taking a few more steps before a gigantic foot appeared from the smoke, landing inches in front of Barry’s face, the pale white toes wiggling on top of a wooden surface as the impact of an enormous high heel knocked barry onto his back.

“Caitlin?” Barry asked himself, his eyes working their way up a pair of long white legs that disappeared under a blue dress as the smoke exited the room through the door Caitlin opened. It only took a few seconds for the smoke to completely dissipate, revealing a simply gigantic Dr. Caitlin Snow to the newly shrunken Barry Allen.

His eyes stared up at his new friend with unblinking disbelief, shrinking matter had always be disregarded by scientists as an impossibility but this instance proved that it could be done. He just wished it didn’t have to happen to him.

“Caitlin!” Barry yelled in an attempt to get the towering woman’s attention, estimating that he was about an inch tall based off of Caitlin’s current height. Nevertheless his efforts seemed to yield results as Caitlin’s eyes wandered towards her feet, in front of which stood a little red speck.

“Barry?” she asked surprised, bending down to inspect what she suspected was a tiny Barry Allen. Meanwhile Barry was still awestruck by her incredible size, trying to resist his fight or flight instinct as her fingers reached down, pinching him between her thumb and pointer finger before lifting him to her face under the gaze of her hazel colored eyes.

“I didn’t think this was possible?” Caitlin said.

“When you run the heat you generate causes your atoms to separate, allowing you to move at greater and greater speeds. Prolonged use of your speed must have trigger pushed them to the point where they could no longer separate and forced them to rejoin thus shrinking you to this size.” Caitlin explained, carrying Barry outside of the speed lab.

“Can you reverse it, return me to my normal size?” Barry asked, not wanting to be both the fastest and the smallest man alive for the rest of his life. He could hide his speed from Iris but something told him that he couldn’t hide his size from her. That is if she even saw him before she stepped on him or sat on him accidentally.

“I think I can, but not without the properly connected data about how closely your structure has been compressed together. If I over calculate it could tear you apart but if I underestimate the results you could shrink even further.” Caitlin continued to explain, neither option seemingly appealing.

“So what do you need, a blood test?” Barry asked, not sure of how Caitlin intended to treat someone so tiny.

"Not exactly, any sample I took from you would either be too much for your body to handle losing or would require an electron microscope to view. So I'll have to conduct more direct tests." Caitlin stated, looking down at Barry with a concerning look in her big brown eyes.

"What do you mean?" Barry asked, not liking the way Caitlin phrased her words.

"What I mean is that in order to find out exactly how dense your body is I'll have to conduct hours of testing where me and you are in direct contact with one another. Otherwise my results could be miscalculated and we run the risk of you never returning to your normal size." Caitlin said, walking into her lab in the Cortex.

"Caitlin, don't I get a decision in all of this?" Barry asked, but he wasn't met with a verbal answer. Instead Caitlin choose to walk towards her desk, ignoring his question all together.

"Okay Barry, I promise that I'll try to keep this from getting as unpleasant as possible, first I'd like to test your density by ____________."

1. "...dropping you in my shoe while I'm out picking up supplies." Caitlin picks up a pair of worn sneakers from underneath her desk, taking off her heels and dropping Barry inside her shoe to act as her new insole while she's out of the lab.

2. "...putting you on my chair and sitting on you while I work, writing my findings down on scrap paper so Cisco and Dr. Wells don't think anything is up." Caitlin uses Barry as her own personal seat cushion, ignoring his cries for help as she brings her butt down on his puny body.

3. "...putting you (Caitlin's cell phone rings)." A call from Cisco results in Caitlin needing to leave to meet with him, Iris, and Eddie at their favorite bar. Leaving her too make up an excuse for Barry's absence, hiding him in her bra cup for safe keeping while she begins drinking with their friends.

Meanwhile, on Earth 2, Jesse Quick was preparing to enter her own breach to go visit Earth 1. She had been a superhero on Earth 2 for a while now and had gotten pretty good with her speed powers. Even so, she often found herself looking to Barry for help with new situations. This was another one of those occasions, so she decided to pop over to Earth 1 and see if Barry was around. Unfortunately for Barry, both speedsters entered their respective breaches at the exact same time. This had never happened before, and it had never occurred to any of the Star Labs team that this was something they'd have to worry about. As it turned out, it was not something that the Speedforce handled very well. In order to prevent the two speedsters from colliding, the speed force twisted and warped the corridors between worlds, fighting against the momentum of the speedsters hurtling towards one another. Unbeknownst to Jesse, she was redirected back towards Earth 2 by a forced U turn in the interdimensional space. This was still considerably better than what happened to Barry.
