"Quick little guy aren't you, luckily for me, I'm pretty QUICK myself." Jesse teased, bringing her foot down hard at the mention of the word 'Quick' enjoying her play on words. She matched her speed to Barry's without even realizing it, not even noticing that Barry the bug was using the Speed Force himself.

Horrified, Barry looked up as the rubber sole of Jesse's costume came down to wipe him out of existence, bracing himself for the impact when suddenly.

BOOM!

Her foot reconnected with the floor, sending out a powerful shockwave that made the very ground shake. She twisted her foot in a downward motion, making sure in her mind that the bug was dead.

"Ugh, I'm a Superhero, not an exterminator. Dad better hire somebody to take care of any more bugs crawling around here, before they have to answer to me." Jesse announced, lifting her foot to see that there was nothing left of the bug either on the floor or her sole.

Although, Barry was still very much alive. In the split second, before Jesse crushed his body to a gooey pulp, he began vibrating his molecules which allowed him to phase right through her costume. Unfortunately, the impact of her foot still caused Barry to lose his balance, tripping over his own feet and landing directly under Jesse's naked toes.

Despite the odor of Jesse's feet, Barry was still happy to be alive for the time being. But, Barry quickly realized that his situation hadn't gotten any better as he tried to phase out of Jesse's costume, unable to do so. Getting inside was easy, even effortless. However, escaping Jesse's foot was still impossible for the time being, he only hoped that she would take off the costume soon and that she'd be decent by the time he escaped so there wouldn't be any further awkwardness by the time he got her attention.

"Hmm, since I can't go to Earth-1 right now I might as well go on patrol." Jesse shrugged, unaware that a second Speedster would be accompanying her around Earth-2's Central City. Then, something unexpected happened, while attempting to access the Speed Force Barry and Jesse's potential energy was enhanced tenfold, with Jesse as the benefactor. A side effect from clashing inside of the Speed Force.

"Whoa, what's going on?" Jesse asked as intense bolts of bright golden lightning ran up and down her entire body, starting at her toes and running up to the top of her head and back down again. The energy was incredibly potent, giving Jesse a desire to see what she could do with this new boost to her abilities.

"Wow, this sensation is incredible. I feel, powerful. " Jesse smiled, pausing for a moment as she looked at the clock, waiting for it to hit four o' clock.

*Tick, Tick, Tick, Click*

In a Flash of light Jesse exited the room, exiting the S.T.A.R Labs building in at a moments notice. Next, she decided to test her newfound speed on the streets first. Unfortunately for Barry, he was in the worst possible spot for Jesse's test run.

Underneath her toes, Barry was battered time and time again by the large appendages. Each of which was about as big as he was, except for her pinkie which was equivalent to about half his current size, and her big toe which was nearly two times bigger than him.

Each digit was relentless in their assault, pinning Barry to the bottom of her boot with each other step while scrunching his face in her toe cleavage every time she lifted her foot off the ground. All while forced to live in Flash-Time, he endured all of this in real time, slowly and painfully humiliating.

Making matters worse was the fact that Jesse had already worked up a sweat, made even worse by her fast metabolism, causing her to sweat more than an average person. The salty liquid covered Barry's entire body, seeping through his clothes and getting inside his mouth.

Although it was nothing when compared to her toe jam, the black gunk wrapping itself around his face like a mud mask, making it harder to breathe and forcing him to swallow bits and pieces of it washed down with a serving of the previously mentioned foot sweat.

Much to the contrary Jesse was having the time of her life. She never felt more alive than when she was running fast enough to break the sound barrier. Enjoying the feeling of wind rushing through her hair, lightning running through her veins, not to mention the excitement of riding a roller coaster for the first time.

Quickly approaching the ocean, Jesse decided to try running on water, something she'd yet to try since discovering her abilities. However, something about this new surge in power made her feel invincible. Like she could do anything and everything she set her mind to and then some.

At the same time, Barry was busy enduring his own version of hell under Jesse's toes, unaware that things were about to get even worse. The skyscraper-sized Speedster leaned forward, trying to increase her speed further as she neared the beach.

The first step she took on the sand was hard for Barry to ignore, her foot hitting the ground hard with the force of an earthquake, and while this had become normal the aftershocks that followed were an entirely different matter as Jesse's weight sunk into the sand. Before that, she'd only been running on solid surfaces such as concrete and asphalt. However, this secondary impact was just the catalyst Barry needed to finally free himself from Jesse's sweaty toes.

This process repeated itself several more times until Barry was dragged beneath the ball of Jesse's foot where he was forced to endure the brunt of her full weight as she pushed herself forward. Luckily, it wasn't long before Jesse hit the water, saving Barry from ending up as a stain on the bottom of Jesse's foot. Although, it did come with a few unforeseen drawbacks in exchange.

Now that Jesse was no longer sprinting on a solid or semi-solid surface, her footfalls meet with little resistance on the ocean's surface. This meant that there was no longer anything keeping Barry in place underneath her foot, allowing him to slide freely around the underside of her foot.

Starting at the ball of her foot, Barry struggled as he attempted to pull himself back to safety under Jesse's toes, heading in the opposite direction entirely. In a few short moments, Barry got well acquainted with Jesse's sole, learning it's every curve as he traveled along her soft skin, swallowing what felt like half a gallon of foot sweat along the way.

At this point, Jesse could feel that something was off as Barry was involuntarily tickling her foot on his way to her heel. Now she could have easily gotten off at the riverbed and crushed the source of the disturbance the moment her foot met with the solid ground again, but she was also curious to find out what was inside of her shoe.

So instead she ran back towards S.T.A.R Labs, making barry trip under her heel a quick one before he was slingshot back towards Jesse's toes thanks to some impressive footwork by Jesse Quick. This time intentionally grasped by the massive digits as she followed the water back to her father's research building.

Jesse rushed into the building in the blink of an eye, stopping where she'd began and looking at the clock to see that it had just hit 4:01 PM, meaning that her entire run around the city had only taken her one minute. Though being stuck in Flash-time, it felt closer to an hour for the shrunken Barry Allen.

"Woooo, record time!" Jesse yelled, jumping joyfully as she shattered her old record of two and a half minutes to complete a patrol. Turning her attention back to whatever was in her shoe, undressing down to her underwear in a flash. The entire suit needed to be taken off just for her feet to breathe fresh air, a drawback to being aerodynamic.

She sat down on a nearby chair and lifted her foot up, squinting as she looked between her toes to see what looked like a tiny red bug. However, upon taking a closer look, she realized what or more accurately who was between her toes.

"Barry is that you?" She asked, shocked by this development. Quick to put the pieces together with her genius-level intellect she figured out everything that happened to Barry, and that he was the source of her new speed.

What will she do next?

1. Jesse brings Barry back to Caitlin on Earth 1, popping him into her mouth to protect him from any more negative effects.

2. Jesse gets a Meta-Human alert, not wanting to step on Barry again, she secures him between her buttcheeks before running off to fight the threat.

3. Jesse likes her new speed and tells Barry she will try to help, keeping him as her new pet instead.
123122.title: Insole for a Speedster

1242.content:
Okay, your in for some interesting shrinking scenarios with this character. Able to stretch his body great lengths and change his form Ralph Dibny has become a superhero in season 4 as Elongated Man. How shall he shrink?

1. Ralph shrinks inside of the Star Labs Cortex while trying to find a way to get Barry out of prison, shortly after Iris walks into the room and over Ralph, sticking him to the bottom of her boots yet again.

2. Ralph wakes up to find himself trapped in a jar inside of Marlize Devoe's laboratory where she plans to make him a test subject for her experiments.

If neither of these catches your interest or doesn't have the character you were looking for you can make another choice in the next chapter by following the third option.
1242.title: Flash Season 4: Ralph Shrinks

choices: A Piece of Gum for Iris
12421.content:
Iris's Outfit: https://uploads.wornontv.net/2016/10/iri...

Iris strolled into the Cortex, black heels clicking on the hard linoleum floor. She was alone as far as she could tell and enjoying a moment of relative peace. The Thinker had been off the grid for a while, giving the team plenty of time to relax. Feeling her phone buzz in her pocket, she stopped walking and pulled out her phone to see who was trying to reach her. It was a call from her dad.

As Iris began to talk on the phone, she was completely unaware of what was going on at her feet. There on the ground, at a mere two inches tall, was Ralph Dibny. Once again, he had been shrunken and was now at the unaware mercy of a giant Iris. He had been trying to figure out a way to get Barry out of prison, and was experimenting with the tech Caitlin had been working on to try and grow him and Cisco back when they'd first shrunken. However, with no science education of his own, he'd made a mistake and shrunken himself. He ran towards her, coming to a stop between her giant boots as she stood idly, chatting on the phone. "Iris! Look down here!" He yelled, hoping his teammate would see him. He couldn't help but be nervous looking at the giant boot next to him. It was, in fact, the very same boot that he'd been stuck to the bottom of the first time he shrunk, and he had no interest in being squished again. "Iris!"

Unfortunately, it was fruitless. Iris couldn't hear him over her phone call. In fact, he suspected that even without the phone call his tiny voice on the ground was not going to be enough to be heard. He looked up at the towering girl, but from where he was standing, all he saw was the gigantic tent of Iris's skirt. And at the top of that tent, he could see Iris's underwear. It was a red thong that covered her crotch but left little of her tremendous ass to the imagination. He could see her gigantic brown cheeks, each one big enough to obliterate him were he to be unfortunate enough to find himself under one.

He tried to shake the sight out of his head, his fear of being squished overwhelming his attraction to the giant girl. However, he doubted he'd ever forgotten the sight of the biggest ass he'd ever seen. Not wanting to be caught in this compromising position, Ralph tried to stretch his arms out to wave for Iris's attention but found instead that his stretchy powers weren't working.

While Ralph continued his futile attempts to get her attention on the ground, Iris was none the wiser. After several minutes, she finished up her phone call with a "Love you dad." before hanging up her phone and taking a step towards the exit. As her foot hit the ground, she heard a familiar SQUISH.

Iris lifted her boot and checked the sole, silently hoping she was wrong about what she was about to say beneath it. What she found was a squished Ralph, splattered on her sole.

https://66.media.tumblr.com/01a87f3de76d...

"Ralph! How are you so tiny again?!" Iris said, once again peeling him off her boot in disgust. "And what are you doing down on the floor by my feet again?"

"Thank god you found me, Iris. I've been standing at your feet for like 10 minutes trying to get your attention." Ralph said, catching his breath after Iris's boot had squeezed it out of him.

"You've been down there for 10 minutes?" Iris asked, suddenly self-conscious of the fact that she was wearing a skirt.

"Yeah, Iris you weren't noticing me...." Ralph explained, not liking where this was going.

"So you decided the best way to get my attention was to stand on the floor between my legs and yell my name? Even after it wasn't working? Why didn't you use your stretchy powers?" Iris asked skeptically.

"My powers aren't working for some reason," Ralph answered, trying not to make eye contact with the terrifying giantess. This was hard given that her eyes were bigger than satellite dishes and trained directly on him. But it was true. He'd tried to stretch his arms to wave in front of Iris's face, but had found himself unable to do so.

"What do you mean your powers aren't working? I scraped you off my boot just a second ago! If you had lost your powers, you'd be a blood stain!" Iris said angrily, now feeling confident Ralph was lying. "You weren't trying to get my attention at all you little perv! You shrunk yourself so you could spy on me and Caitlin, and then when I came in here in this skirt you decided to try and sneak a peek."

"No Iris that's not it at all. If you'd just lis-" Ralph began, before being cut off by Iris squeezing her fist around him.

"I am done listening to you Ralph. You need to be taught a lesson. And I know just how to do it...."

What does Iris do?

1. Iris licks her lips, deciding that Ralph would make a delicious piece of gum.

2. Iris squeezes Ralph into a ball, before molding him into a skimpy thong. If Ralph wanted to look up her skirt, she was going to make sure he got a really good look.

3. Iris throws Ralph down on the floor, stomps him flat, then inserts him into Caitlin's nearby flat. She thinks he would make a perfect insole for the brunette scientist.
12421.title: Iris Steps on a Gumshoe

124211.content:
"You know what Ralph, I forgive you for trying to look up my skirt. Do you know why? Because you are the perfect size to help me out with a little problem I'm having, you see I forgot to pick up some gum on my way here. I've been chewing a lot lately to help take my mind off Barry until we can prove his innocence." Iris mused out loud, licking her full red lips while holding Ralph in front of her face.

Ralph quickly caught on to Iris's plans and immediately began to voice his concerns, though they weren't of much concern do Iris giving the immense size difference between the two. "Iris wait! Can't we talk about this first?" Ralph asks, causing Iris to pause as she brought her free hand under her chin.

"Hmm, nope. I need a piece of gum and your the closest thing here." Iris responded, lifting Ralph above her hand as she dangled his body by the arms. Gravity pulling him down towards Iris's parting lips as she flashed her perfect white teeth at the shrunken man. Every couple of seconds his arms would stretch by a few more inches, slowly but effectively bringing him even closer to Iris's mouth.

"Looks like someone's eager to get this started. I'd have to be rude and keep you waiting, so I'll just let you go now." Iris teased, tilting her head back and giving Ralph a good look inside her mouth. Her perfect white teeth that caught his eye before, the slippery pink serpent waiting to make Ralph its unwilling plaything, and a dark cave in the back of her throat that appeared to go nowhere as it faded to black.

Iris stayed true to her words and released Ralph from her grasp. Allowing him to freefall into her mouth, and without the full usage of his powers, Ralph was unable to stop or slow his descent. He landed on her upper lip first, but the soft pillow-like surface absorbed his weight before pushing him back towards the opening.

Iris quickly pursed her lips, ensnaring Ralph's legs between her lower and upper lips. She struggled to look down, wanting to see the expression on Ralph's face before what happened next. Soon after, Iris because sucking Ralph down like a piece of wet spaghetti, drawing him into her mouth as he tried to prevent the inevitable.

Ralph reached up, trying to grab onto Iris's nose as he felt his entire lower body stretch into the form of a long thin noodle ending at her tongue. 95% of his legs had already been scarfed down, shrinking even more as they were reduced to the width of string fibers. Even as his waist was being drawn in by Iris's wet lips, Ralph tried to ignore just how good it actually felt. Being on the receiving end of what was essentially a blow job from a 400-foot tall beautiful woman.

Iris giggled as she felt Ralph grabbing onto her nose, partly responsible was the fact that it actually tickled her. She smiled once more before tightening her lips hold on Ralph's waist, swirling her tongue around his legs and dragging him into her mouth. With one last breath wasted on screams for mercy from the black giantess, Ralph's voice was silenced.

Shortly following this, Ralph struggled to gain his bearings inside of Iris's mouth. His entire lower body stretched across her massive tongue, the cave surrounding his so dark that he couldn't see where his own legs ended as they lead towards her throat. Clearly the last part of Iris's mouth he wanted to move closer towards.

However, before Ralph could get his bearings and move in any other direction Iris's tongue suddenly jerked toward the right side of her mouth, tossing the shrunken man onto her molars. Beyond thoughts of mercy at this point, Iris saw no reason to spare Ralph any longer.

Her jaw snapped upwards, pinning Ralph down as he headed for her top teeth at breakneck speeds for a person his size. He tried to raise his arms in a futile effort to defend himself from the inevitable outcome. Unfortunately, it was a pointless endeavor and Ralph soon found his body smashed into a gooey pulp between Iris's teeth.

SPLAT!

Luckily his body was still made of rubber and curved into the shape of her molars. Not to say that the experience still wasn't both terrifying and humiliating for him, he was starting to feel like an empty container of toothpaste. But Iris still wasn't done with him just yet, she had only just begun to turn him into her unwilling piece of gum.

She began chewing on him gently at first, rolling him from the front to the back of her mouth in an effort to give all of her teeth the chance the bite the shrunken man. Despite the fact that his body wasn't being cut to shreds or torn into itty bitty pieces Ralph was still in considerable pain. Iris's canine's proved to be the worst to deal with, not because they impaled him or inflicted more damage but because of the way they hit him. It was almost like his was being turned inside out, being nothing more than a ball of goo and spit at this point he was fairly certain that he had swallowed his own arm.

Even with Ralph totally pulverized by her teeth, Iris didn't stop to hold back for a singular moment. She continued chewing on him as if he were an average piece of gum, with no real plans for what she'd do with him when she was done with him. She continued to casually parade around the room, doing something she hadn't originally planned on.

* Pooof, Pooof, Pooof! *

^ Was the sound his body made as it was smashed between her teeth before Iris rolled him back onto her tongue and then behind her four front teeth. She poked her tongue into Ralph's back, or maybe it was his chest or stomach, even Ralph couldn't tell at this point.

Iris pushed Ralph's body between her large full lips with her tongue, blowing a stream of air into the pocket space his form created, filling him up like a hot air balloon in the process. She wasn't even aware of what she was doing herself until Ralph's body swelled up to the size of a small marble outside of her mouth.

His body continued to fill with air, stretching out more and more for a few moments as Iris became aware of what she was doing. She paused for a moment to giggle, allowing one of ralph's limbs to break free of her lips grasp. Quickly he deflated like any other bubble, guess he really was Iris's gum in every sense of the word.

He ended up resting on the tip of her tongue, just outside her mouth. His body slowly morphing back into its original human form, spitting out his own arm that had traveled down his throat. Just then a door opened in the distance.

"Iris? What are you doing down here?" asked a familiar female voice belonging to none other than Caitlin Snow herself.

"Huh?" Iris muttered, caught off guard. She didn't want Caitlin to find out what she was doing to Ralph, at least not yet. Perhaps she would reveal him to her alternative persona Killer Frost right away but she'd have to convince Caitlin about what she'd caught Ralph doing first or she might react in the wrong way. She pulled her tongue back into her mouth, flipping Ralph over and pinning him underneath her tongue.

"Oh, hey Caitlin. Umm, I'm not really doing anything. Just got off the phone with my dad about finding a way to get Barry out of prison." Iris responded, coming up with the most believable lie she could on the spot. Her loud voice deafening to Ralph at such a close range. Luckily, Caitlin had no reason to doubt Iris nor any proof to say that she was doing otherwise.

"Its okay Iris, we'll get Barry back and stop DeVoe. Somehow." Caitlin said, unsure of their chances with only Ralph, her, and Cisco. Team Flash had never before operated without a speedster present.

What happens next?

1. Caitlin asks Iris to help her with something in her lab, Iris takes this opportunity to spit Ralph out... onto Caitlin's chair before she sits down.

2. Caitlin asks if Iris would like to unwind with her tonight at a local bar to get drunk with her, Iris not wanting to reveal Ralph just yet makes an excuse to leave the room and forms Ralph into the shape of an insole for her boot.

3. Very suddenly Cisco breaches into the room, accidentally startling Iris into swallowing Ralph. Now she must decide if she should tell Caitlin about what she was really up too or try to solve this new problem on her own.
124211.title: Iris Chews Out Ralph

choices: Still tries to keep it a secret
1242113.content:
Just as Iris decides to say something, a breach fills up the room and Cisco pops right out knocking into Caitlin and Iris.

"Sorry, sorry, I was a bit distracted on the way over here," Cisco says, inviting the two to ask him about his trip.

"You nearly knocked me over Cisco, how could you not be paying attention to when you're breaching over? Don't you know how difficult it would be to get you free if you ended up half stuck in one of the consoles, or what if you got stuck in a wall?" Caitlin starts to rail at Cisco.

"Oh I'll follow you," Caitlin volunteers, obviously feeling that Iris needs the company and wanting to continue the conversation they were having before Cisco so rudely interrupted them, " I'm feeling kind of peckish myself."

"Oh no, you should stay with Cisco, I'm sure there's stuff to do in the lab that he needs your help with" Iris replies, really hoping that Ralph is okay inside her tummy.

"No, please, take her with you," Cisco says, almost pleading," if you leave her here she's going to chew me out for sure."

"Come on Iris," Caitlin says, taking Iris by the arm as she shoots a dirty look at Cisco.

With no way of getting past her friend, Iris walks into the pantry with Caitlin and...

12421132.content:
"IRIS! This isn't funny! Let me out before I go from being elongated man to mushy digested man!" Ralph shouts as he scrambles back to his feet in the pit of Iris's stomach.

Everything happened so fast, one moment he was being tossed around by Iris while her voice boomed in his ear and suddenly his entire body was sucked unceremoniously down her throat.

If it wasn't for his easily compressable nature, he had no doubt that the trip down Iris's esophagus would have crushed his very bones to pulp. Pressing himself up against her inner stomach wall to avoid slipping down the middle and into the depths of her cavernous belly, Ralph could only hope that Iris would find a way to quickly get him out of her.

Outside, Caitlin continued to reassure Iris about Barry as she pulled a couple of tubs of frozen yogurt out of the fridge, handing one over to Iris.

"Oh crap," Iris thought to herself, hoping Ralph was still alright. She would never be able to explain his disappearance if her stomach ended up digesting him. The thought made her shudder and as she took a spoonful of the yogurt, she really hoped he would forgive her for putting him in this position. She had really just intended to give scare him when she had tossed him into her mouth earlier, she knew that he would be able to stand her chewing on his body like a piece of gum.

But this was a totally different thing, she had to get away from Caitlin before her stomach acids started to digest the yogurt...and Ralph along with it.
12421132.title: Still tries to keep it a secret

124213.content:
Iris squinted her eyes at the miniature Ralph.

"You're not going to like this."

She dropped him down to the floor. He was unharmed, of course, but was completely unprepared for what came next. Iris's dusty boot crashed down upon him, stamping him into the floor. She repeatedly dropped her foot onto him, covering the shrunken man in dirt and dust. He shut his eyes to shield them and braces for each time she crushed him. Finally, the foot lifted off and didn't return. He opened his eyes slowly and looked at himself. Iris boomed overhead.

"I hope you like your new form, perv." She smiled innocently at him, fully aware that it was a facade.

"Ha, ha, Iris, flattening me. That's hilarious." Ralph groaned.

"Oh, no, you thought that was it?" Iris giggled a bit. "No, Ralph, you're not getting off the hook that easily." She reached down with two massive fingers and pinched Ralph, pulling him off the floor with a wet smack. He desperately tried to reform himself, but he was far too tuckered out after the constant stamping.

Ralph tried to look at his surroundings but everything blurred as Iris moved him around. He could see that he was still in the Cortex, and that he was behind the desks, and that he was being moved towards a red object. What--

"You're going to do great, Ralph." Iris pressed Ralph into something. Something stiff and slightly warm. He looked around as much as he could in his current state/ The sides of whatever structure he's in curved up above him. There was an arch running above him, shielding his eyes from the piercing lights overhead. His other senses returned slowly and he could smell a faint odor. It was... oily. A little off-putting. He sniffed deeply and his nose was assaulted slightly by a penetrating smell. He gasped.

"Congratulations!" Iris's voice carried somewhere ahead. "You are now the 'sole' proprietor of Caitlin's high heel!"

He shook his head rapidly. "That--"

He was stopped short. What happened?

1. Caitlin walks into the Cortex, her feet sore. She's leaving for the day and is looking for her heels.

2. Iris thinks for a moment. She decides to pull Ralph out of the shoe and stuff him down into her own boots.

1251.title: The Flash Season 5: Who Shrinks?

12511.content:
How should Barry shrink?

1. Nora believes she can stop Barry from disappearing in the future by removing him from the field in the present, having XS protect Central City as it's Speedster in his absence. Keeping him in her boot so nobody finds him shrunk.

2. Barry shrinks in the S.T.A.R Labs lounge, sitting down while trying to think of a way to stop Cicada's reign of Terror. Afterward, Cecile enters the room with a stack of Case files, looking for a seat to comfort her while she takes care of her workload. Luckily, Barry will be serving as some extra padding for her butt.
12511.title: Flash Season 5: Barry Shrinks

125112.content:
Barry Allen had been putting overtime hours into his career as the Flash in his efforts to stop the Metahuman Killer known as Cicada to the citizens of Central City. He'd just finished a three-hour patrol of the city with his daughter Nora, from the future, returning to Star Labs while she eagerly pushed on to find a lead on the villain's whereabouts.

Looking for a moment to himself, Barry rushed towards the newly discovered Star Labs lounge, finding it empty upon his arrival, choosing the closest seat to the door.

Feeling tired, Barry decided to rest his eyes for a few moments, leaning back into his seat, and falling asleep minutes later.

Some time passed before Barry found himself waking up with a massive headache that reminded him of the hangovers he experienced before becoming the Flash. And as he sat up, it quickly became apparent that he was no longer in the Lounge at Star Labs, or so he thought.

Upon closer observation of his surroundings, Barry realized that he was still at Star Labs, it was just the room that had gotten bigger. Barry Allen had shrunk to the size of a fly, wondering how this was even possible without a soul around him to claim responsibility. Could it have been a side effect of overusing his powers lately?

Thinking of many possibilities before resolving to call for help, Barry was thankful that his suit had shrunk along with him, using his communicator to contact Iris for aid.

"Hey babe, I was just about to call you. Are we still going to have Nora over tonight for movies, I was wondering whether or not I should pick something up, she might be a little old for Alice In Wonderland and A Bug's Life." Iris said, unaware of the fact both movies could be related to Barry's current situation.

"Iris, listen, I'm in trouble. Big trouble and I need your help right away. But first, I need you to promise that you won't laugh." Barry said nervously. Wondering how Iris would take the news that her husband was tinier than one of her bootstraps.

"Come on, Barry, you know that I would never laugh at you if you were genuinely in trouble. Just tell me what going on. You're not hurt, are you?" she asked, thinking he sounded just fine over the phone.

"No, at least not physically. But I'm definitely in danger." Barry said, looking around, realizing how easily a one-inch tall man could get hurt in such a big world. "I've been shrunk, Iris," Barry announced over his communicator.

"Wait, you mean like how Cisco and Ralph shrunk to two inches tall last year?" Iris asked, looking down at her feet to see that she was wearing the same boots she stepped on Ralph with last year. Maybe they were cursed?

133311.content:
(Alright, so this whole scenario is based on the Season 3 Episode "Here I Go Again". The premise is that Zari is caught in a time loop after being exposed to some temporal goo from the Waverider. This happens just after she has a huge fight with Sara.)

Sara's Outfit: http://www.cwtv.com/shows/dcs-legends-of...

Zari awoke rubbing her head and in a very bad mood. First she had got in a big fight with Sara after disabling Gideon to run some temporal simulations. Then while she was trying to repair Gideon, she accidentally got exposed to some temporal goo from the engine, and next things she knew the ship exploded. She had been through many of these time loops, and the most recent one had ended with her being swatted with a newspaper by a giant Sara. She expected to wake up from the death the same as she had a million times, but instead she woke up this time to find herself on the floor of the command room, at the same shrunken size she had been swatted at. It also seemed like she had been flashed back to a few minutes later than her previous checkpoint, as Ray was gone and it was just Sara with her in the command room, still in her white disco outfit after returning from her mission. Sara was generally the last person Zari wanted to see right now after their fight, especially at 100 feet tall and walking directly towards her, completely barefoot.

"Sara wait! Don't!" Zari yelled, seeing the giant assassin's barefoot heading straight for her. But her tiny voice went unheard, and the giant bare sole of the blonde assassin dropped down on top of her. Zari was thrown down onto her back under the weight of the ball of Sara's foot.

"Ahhhh, nice to get out of those awful disco shoes." Sara muttered, ending her walk right on top of the shrunken Persian girl. She wiggled her toes happily, unaware of the tiny totem bearer being battered beneath them.

Zari was very aware of what was happening. She had fully expected to be squished again, just as she had under the newspaper. She was horrified to find this was not the case, and that she was merely pinned under the giant assassin's foot, face wedged right between the big and second toes of the ship's captain. Fortunately Sara was quite clean, but a night of dancing under disco lights in thick shoes had not gone unnoticed by the Sara's feet, and the entire front half of Zari's body was now coated in the giant blonde's sweat. She tried to wriggle forward out from under the enormous foot, but Sara's relieved toe wiggling began right on cue. Zari screamed as she saw the pad of Sara's big toe hanging over her head. It seemed to purposefully pause above her face, as though purposefully taunting her. Had Sara actually known about Zari's position, she might have relished in the fear Zari was feeling as she looked up at her threatening toe. But of course, Sara and her giant toe had no knowledge of the pain they were inflicting with a normally innocent motion.

Zari's scream only stopped when the toe slammed down directly on her face, the sweaty flesh of her toe forcing its way into her mouth as it hammered down on her face like a nail, undoing some of the progress Zari had made as Zari was forced back beneath the sweaty foot. The sweaty toe briefly rubbed itself across the tiny totem bearer's face as Sara subconsciously questioned what exactly was underneath her toe, rubbing the sweaty flesh across Zari's tongue and nearly breaking her nose in the process. Sara apparently decided the sharp angles of Zari's face were little more than the corners of a pebble that had snuck its way onto the wave rider

Zari barely had time to spit out the assassin's sweat before the toe came down again, hammering away. With each strike, Zari was sliding a little further beneath the assassin's foot. After 3 strikes, she was back to where she started before her attempt to get free. And the next strike slammed her face directly into the gap between Sara's toes, burying her face first in the disgusting between the toe flesh. She knew better than to scream, as she could still taste Sara's toe flesh in her mouth. But keeping her mouth shut meant breathing entirely through her nose, and no matter how clean Sara was, no ones sweaty feet smelled great at point blank range.

Finally, Sara's toes settled down, stopping their hammering assault on Zari. However, Zari's head was still hopelessly wedged between Sara's toes, and there was no escape from their grip. She couldn't scream, she couldn't move, she was completely at the mercy of Sara's foot. And when Sara raised her foot to take a step, Zari came along for the ride. Between the gripping pressure of Sara's giant toes on her skull and the sticky sweat on the underside of Sara's foot, Zari was completely stuck. She couldn't see anything but the skin between Sara's toes, but she could feel the cool air of the Waverider on her back as Sara's foot glided forward.

The back of the ball of Sara's foot touched down first, pinning and threatening to snap Zari's tiny femurs. Zari felt like she was being flattened under a rolling pin as Sara's weight rolled forward, crushing her hips, then her stomach and chest in turn. If Ray's shrinking process hadn't made her more resistant to being squished, she'd be a pancake on the Waverider floor by now. Eventually the rolling reached her face, the force on her skull increasing as Sara's toes flexed under the weight of Sara's step. Before her head was squished into paste though, Sara's foot lifted upwards again, preparing for a future step.

Each step was just as painful as the last. Zari lost count after only a few, focusing her time in the air only on gasping for air when possible and assessing whether any of her bones were broken. She spent her brief periods on the ground trying to separate herself from Sara's foot, but the sweat and immense pressure wouldn't let her do so. She had no idea where in the room Sara was or what she was doing. Her whole world was the underside of the giant foot.

"Zari! Gideon's still not working!" Sara called, annoyed that her ship was out of commission and there was nothing she herself could do about it. When she didn't get a reply, she angrily shouted "Ugh, when I find that girl I'm going to stomp some sense into her." In her anger, she raised her foot for an angry stomp, completely unaware that Zari was stuck to it.

The quick rising of Sara's foot was enough to free Zari's face from Sara's toes, briefly freeing her mouth to scream. But her scream was snuffed out as soon as her foot started descending, throwing Zari's face back into the toes' grip and blinding her to the deadly fate she knew was coming. She felt a quick, sharp pain as the foot touched down on the ground, and then....

CRUNCH!

Zari's tiny body was completely annihilated, leaving her unrecognizable on the underside of the captain's foot. Whatever resistance her body had from the shrinking process no match for Sara's full forced stomp. Sara didn't even notice the bloody stain on her foot as she strode out of the room, not having any idea just how much sense she stomped into her shrunken crew member.

--------------------

Zari gasped as she woke up once again, happy to have air that hadn't been tainted by Sara's feet. Speaking of which, she realized if she didn't move, she'd be right back under Sara's foot again. She quickly rolled to one side, only barely dodging the tremendous foot that had just squashed her out of existence in her previous life.

What happens?

1. Sara notices the tiny Zari rolling out of the way, and recognizes her. And she fully intends to take out her anger on the shrunken woman, especially once Zari explains the lack of consequences from the time loop. (Reserved)

2. Sara doesn't notice Zari, and leaves the room. Zari heads off to to Amaya's room to get her attention.

3. Sara doesn't notice Zari, but Zari hitches a ride on the back of Sara's disco pant leg as Sara heads back to her room to change our of her disguise.
133311.title: Here We Go Again, But Smaller

1333111.content:
Once again Zari found herself caught in the same time loop she'd lived through a hundred times, and once again she found herself staring up at a hundred foot tall Sara towering over her. This time around however she took note of Sara's foot as it propelled itself into the air above her. Not wanting to end up trapped under and then squashed beneath the blondes foot Zari acted quickly, rolling to her right side for safety.

"Ahhhh, nice to get out of those awful disco shoes." Sara muttered, ending her walk directly over the shrunken Persian girl. She continued to wiggle her toes in delight, just as she had in the previous variation of the time loop.

The ten digits drummed rhythmically on the floor close to Zari who hadn't strayed too far from Sara's gigantic feet. She figured if she could remember the path that Sara took around the room during her last reincarnation then she might be able to avoid ending up under them a second time. However, she had yet to notice that Sara had turned her gaze to the floor.

Ready to crush Zari under her naked foot for the second time, though this time she would be bringing down her foot with the intention to kill, which would no doubt result in a quicker demise than last time. The shrunken Persian girl starting to believe it was her new destiny to die endlessly beneath Sara's feet.

"Sara wait! You already crushed me under your foot!" Zari yelled, not wanting to get reacquainted with the underside of Sara's foot.

"What?" Sara asked, holding herself back from stepping on the bug-sized girl a second time. "Explain yourself?" Sara demanded, her voice booming from Zari's point of view, serving to make the blonde assassin even more terrifying.

"I'm caught in a time loop. Ray and I shrunk down to spy on you, after which you found and crushed us with a rolled up newspaper. Then after the time loop reset, I was still shrunk and you stepped on me. If we don't work together then the ship is going to explode in less than an hour." Zari explained, still looking up at Sara passed her toes.

"Is that so?" Sara asked in a singsong voice, pulling her foot back and placing it back on the ground. She leaned forward, reaching for the floor in front of her feet, stretching her fingers out around the tiny totem bearer.

Zari panicked, she looked for a way out as Sara's fingers wrapped around her, unable to find one. Sara squeezed Zari between her thumb and index finger, squeezing tightly as they wrapped around her torso. She exhaled shapely, finding it harder to draw in breath with Sara's thumb pressing down on her breasts with about 200 pounds of pressure.

Sara walked across the room towards the captain's office, holding Zari at level with her breasts the whole time. It was clear given the look on her face that Sara was focused on looking for something, perhaps Ray's size changing gun so that could restore Zari's original size. However, this turned out to be nothing more than wishful thinking as Sara instead pulled a chair away from the wall with her foot and promptly dropped the tiny totem bearer on its surface.

"Sara, what are you doing?" Zari asked, not liking the way Sara was looking down at her, hands on her hips and a smile spread across her face. Answering the Persian woman's question by turning in the opposite direction, bringing her giant butt over the seat Zari currently found herself standing on.

"I'm teaching you a lesson in what happens when you disobey your captain's orders," Sara announced, waving her hips from side too side. Taunting Zari with the ass that had attracted the attention of many women throughout history. These numbers including but not limited to Anne of Austria, Queen Guinevere, and the entire female population of age in Salem, Massachusetts during her brief time there in 1693.

"Oh shit!" Zari thought out loud, realizing that Sara intended to crush her beneath her rear end, clad in tight spandex. She'd just told her angry captain that she was practically immortal and would reincarnate upon her death, looking back Zari realized this to be a big mistake.

Sara took a short step to her side with one foot, increasing the distance between her feet before dropping her weight onto the seat below in one fluid motion. Meanwhile, Zari watched helplessly from below knowing she was destined to die yet again under Sara as the assassin's butt fell towards her like a falling meteor.

*Boom*

The seat shifted as it took on the brunt of Sara's weight. However, it was Zari who was actually forced to withstand the majority of Sara's full weight as her butt came to rest on top of her. On top of that there was little to no padding on the seat Sara had selected, making the force exerted on top of the shrunken girl that much more severe to endure.

Sara had removed any trace of negative emotions for what came next, she already knew Zari would be reborn at the beginning of the next hour. Living with the memory of being crushed under her powerful bottom. What a perfect way to renew fear in the newest member on board the Waverider.

Instead, the blonde captain chooses to smile. Lifting her feet off the ground Sara began bearing more of her full weight on Zari's tiny frame. She could both feel and hear the stain on her bones as the began to crack and break under Sara's massive buttocks.

Finally, Sara decided to end things with a bang. She reduced the weight on Zari's body to nothing, lifting her butt off the seat a few inches into the air above her. Even with Zari being shrunk Sara knew the limits of her body quite well. The female assassin caused just enough damage to leave Zari immobilized in the wake of being sat on. She could only watch helplessly from the surface of Sara's seat as her butt continued to loom overhead. The tiny totem bearer was powerless, unable to so much a lift a finger against her captain as she prepared to finish her.

"Goodbye Zari, hopefully, you'll learn something from this," Sara announced passively, coldly and swiftly starting on Zari's execution. Her full weight coming down centered on her enormous buttocks as they pinned Zari to the seat. However, Zari's body was too weak after her last run-in with the assassin's rear to handle any more damage. Instead, her body was instantly overtaken by Sara's ass and silently crushed to a pulp. Her screams muffled by Sara's doughy rear cheeks as she passed away under the blonde woman's bottom.

How will Zari fair in her next life?

1. Zari is reborn yet again right where she started but this time dodges to the left, going unnoticed by Sara. This allows her to travel around the ship looking for help from one of her other crewmates. Stumbling upon Amaya who hears her on the ground and wants to help her.

3. Zari starts her new life already able to tell something is amiss with Sara looking directly down at her on the floor. Apparently, the clock that she respawns at later times, putting her in a precarious position with Sara's full attention placed on her.

134131.title: Legends of Tomorrow Season 4: Ray Shrinks

1341311.content:
Ray sighs as he tinkers with his suit, just a little more and it'll be ready for his mission. Since Nora had turned herself in nobody had been allowed see her, Ray himself had been rather intensely stonewalled and nearly thrown out of the Time Bureau when he stunk away to find her cell and go visit her. He promised he'd visit her and help keep her sane while she served her time and he was a man of his word, even if he had to do it the Legends way: completely ignoring authority figures and doing it yourself

"Gideon, is the program ready?" he asks putting down his tools

"Yes Mr Palmer, it should imbed itself into the cell's coding and enable you to control it from your suit, once it was uploaded to the correct room of course" came the AI's usual even tone

Ray smiles and starts putting on the ATOM suit "Thanks Gideon, and if possible could you ensure the team doesn't find out about this?"

"Find out about what?" he jumps, nearly falling over onto his butt but instead turns and see's Sara standing at the door, looking curious "What are you doing Ray?" she asks

"Did a few tweaks and upgrades to the ATOM suit, thought it would be a good time with nothing happening to give it a test flight, nothing wrong with that is it Captain?" he asks, swallowing loudly and starting to sweat under her gaze

Sara sighs "You are still a really bad liar Ray, but given how badly you want to keep this a secret I'll allow it..." she then jabs him in the chest with her finger "...but you better be back here tomorrow, or I'm sending the entire team looking for you, got that?" she asks, though there was only one answer

"Yes Sara, I'll be back before morning" Ray smiles and Sara relaxes

"Whatever you're going to do, please don't do anything to stupid, at least not by yourself" she warns, though there was concern in her voice

"You got it boss, no bad things for me" he waves and Sara rolls her eyes but walks away. Once she left Ray put on the rest of his suit, as well as pull out the Time Courier he'd 'borrowed' from Gary to get into the Time Bureau undetected.

Once the gateway opened he shrunk down to bug size, flying though and closing the breech behind him. Getting from the main office to the prisoner cells would have been a problem, except Mona was on food rounds, enabling him to hitch a ride through security and into the prisoner quarters. Nora's was surprisingly easy to find, mostly because she was the only human they had... and her name was on the security panel.

Flying through a vent Ray makes his way to the identical panel on the inside of the cell, mostly so it would take longer for any form of tampering to be noticed. Flying over to the touch pad Ray transmit his control code to the device, which beeped and flashed for a minute but besides that there were no problems, no flashing red lights or harsh sirens, he was pretty sure he was in the clear. "And here we go" he says mostly to himself as he pressed a button on the gauntlet and the force field drops.

"Oh crap, I really hope this isn't what I think it is" Nora thinks out loud and she moves from her lying position, putting the book she'd been reading on the small table beside her and sat up, her bare feet padding against the floor as she moved to the side of her bed.

'Nora looked so innocent there reading, even if it's a murder mystery, hey that's the same one Ava was reading maybe when Nora's free she can join book club. Or not, well anything's better than Mick's literary erotica' Ray thinks as he watches Nora for a moment, the though of Nora reading Mick's book following a few other things he'd rather not think about, he'd had enough dreams involving himself and Nora, most normal enough, but some with him small enough to fit in her hand, between her rather nicely sized breasts, filling her pus... no! now it not the time for fantasising, this was a covert visit and nothing was to ruin that. Well except the force field glitching out

"Crap, Gideon what's going on?" he asks, increasing the speed in which he shot towards the not so evil witch

"It would appear the first thing Mr Haywood had Miss Tomaz fix and upgrade was the security of the magical creature cells, it's fighting the virus" Gideon explains, this didn't exactly help Ray's worried mood, especially when the energy field came back online at full power.

BZZZZZZZZZZZ

Just as he crossed the threshold. Energy coursed through the ATOM suit, the system not able to handle this much energy at it's miniaturised size. With the suit fried though still retaining the momentum it had previously Ray was hurtling towards Nora Dahrk with no control or steering beyond rather uselessly flailing his arms and legs around like a crazy person, so this was not going to end well for him

Where does Ray end up?

1) He rather luckily ends up falling into Nora's open shirt, getting caught in her bra/cleavage, but also rather quickly noticed by the woman he'd just used the chest of as an airbag

2) Ray hits the ground with a thump just beside Nora's foot, the startled and slightly disgusted woman thinking he was a bug that got in when the force field was down and tries to crush him. Ray has to avoid getting smushed as well as try get some less violent attention from his not quite girlfriend, preferably before people notice he's missing or that her cell malfunctioned

3) Ray lands on the bed, Nora notices out the corner of her eye and after figuring out it was him and hearing what and why he did it, tells him that's the nicest and dumbest thing she's ever heard, but she's happy he's here to relieve her boredom, even if it means he's a prisoner just like her.
1341311.title: Nora's Tiny Cellmate

13413113.content:
Ray quickly found himself falling at breakneck speeds towards Nora's bed, unable to stop or slow his descent without his suit being powered up. He braced himself for a crash landing, his body rolling on top of Nora's bed like a boulder in an Indiana Jones movie before landing flat on his back.

"Ugh, I'm okay!" He shouted, knowing nobody could hear him. He glanced over to see Nora still wandering around inside the confines of her cell.

She hadn't noticed him yet or sensed his presence, likely because he was as small as a Tic-Tac. What's worse is that after a few moments, Ray's suit failed to activate its emergency backup generator, making it the worlds largest, or in his case smallest paperweight.

The A.T.O.M Suit would only be a hindrance to his goals if he wanted to get Nora to notice him at this size, opting to engage the emergency release. The protection the suit granted was little without its full capabilities, best to leave it behind so he can move quickly for now.

Her massive body caused the ground and furniture to shake with each step, something Ray had become accustomed to after shrinking himself for four years. "Seriously?" Nora asked, annoyed as she immediately felt the lump under her butt return for a second time, deciding to investigate further. She stood up, this time taking Ray with her after he became stuck to her pants by sweat. Swinging him through the air as she turned to examine her seat, not seeing anything out of the ordinary. "Wait, something's wrong." Oliver said to himself. This was really happening, Oliver was shrinking.

Something not many people in Starling City could afford, few of which would be found in his club.

Oliver hoped he was wrong in guessing who the owner of these designer brand shoes were, however as he turned his gaze upwards Oliver saw none other than his own sister Thea looking down at him in disbelief. She had been watching Oliver as he shrunk from across the club after their little spat earlier and had a hard time believing that her eyes weren't playing tricks on her.

"Ollie?" She said confused, finding it hard to distiguish her brother from a insect on the floor at her feet. Unfortunately for Oliver given Thea's massive size she was all but impossible to get away from, soon pinching his tiny body between her fingertips tightly, forcing the air inside his body to escape through his lungs. 14112.content:
It had been nearly four months since Oliver’s return to Starling City from Lian Yu, In that time he’d gathered a team to help him fight crime as the vigilante known as the Hood, started the finishing touches on his nightclub Verdant , and taken down criminals such as the Count, Deadshot, and the Dodger.

After a series of intense workouts Oliver prepared himself to go out in the field, having already selected another businessman from his father’s list who made their fortune off the suffering of others. Tonight he’d reform his criminal ways and return the money he’d stored in his offshore accounts. At least that’s what Oliver thought as he finished up his final set on the Salmon Ladder, his favorite form of exercise.

He dropped down from the ceiling prepared to dawn Yao Fei’s hood and deal out his unique form of justice to those who had poisoned his city. However before this could be done Oliver began to feel strange, it was a feeling his body could never forget. The effects of being poisoned himself.

Quickly he rushed towards the crate he’d brought home from Lian Yu, contained inside was several bags of Yao Fei’s miracle herbs from the island. He opened one of the bags and immediately began ingesting the herbs, taking a drink of water to force it down before laying on the floor and passing out.

He awoke about an hour later, still dazed by the effects of whatever drug had found it’s way into his system. Although as Oliver sat up and examined his surrounding he found a slight hangover to be the least of his worries.

Everything surrounding him was now proportionally gigantic in size. Impossible as it might seem, Oliver Queen had shrunk down to an inch tall in height. However, unlike most people Oliver did not panic, he gathered his wits together and assessed the positives of his current situation along with the negatives.

On the bright side of things Oliver was fortunate enough to shrink while still in his hideout, which meant he was safe from usually dangerous opponents who would have no trouble at all killing him off at an inch tall such as China White or the Huntress.

However Oliver was also smart enough to realize the cons to shrinking in his hideout, while he was exactly where he’d want to go for help he had no realistic way of getting help from Diggle and Felicity at his current size.

Then as if on cue with Oliver’s thoughts of reaching out to his team for help the entrance to the “Arrowcave” as Felicity calls it opened, revealing the massive blonde herself as she walked down the metal stairs with a bag from Big Belly Burger in hand. Her high heels clicked against the steps twice with every step she took, heel, toe, heel, toe, each step louder than the last as she got closer to the bottom.

Finally she reached the bottom of the stairs, her high heels connecting with the solid concrete beneath her. Now her steps were a lot more powerful and easily felt by Oliver from a distance as she took a few steps forward into the room.

"Oliver? Are you in here?" She asked, taking a moment to pause as she noticed Oliver's suit was still in its case.

"Hmm, that's weird. I guess her took the night off. I didn't know Oliver Queen was capable of doing that but I guess even Playboy vigilantes need a night to rest." Felicity said to herself, unaware that Oliver was still in the room. She then proceeded to her desk anyways, no doubt planning to search for any leads concerning Walter's whereabouts.

Oliver watched in awe as she walked across the room, amazed by the incredible distances she was able to cover from his point of view in a single step. If he were still normal sized and Felicity was as gigantic as she was by comparison she would no doubt be able to clear entire blocks with a single step forwards maybe even two or three. At last she came to a stop in front of her desk, pulling out her leather chair and taking a seat in front of her computer systems.

With Felicity stationary Oliver decided that this was his best chance to make his move and get her attention, he ran as fast as he could at his new size but even at his top speed it took him a few minutes to reach Felicity's desk. He didn't expect to be adding cardio to his workout tonight.

Oliver continued running forward under the back of Felicity's desk,deciding in the spur of the moment that it would take to long to go around. He jumped between plugs, climbing over and diving under a jungle of tangled wires. Then at long last he came out on the other side, greeted almost immediately by Felicity's open toes on top of her heels, each nail coated electric blue paint.

He took a step back, analyzing the blonde IT from head to toe or rather toe to head was more accurate from where he was standing. Oliver continue looking for anything that might help him get Felicity's attention, but saw no opening other than climbing her entire body to her face. A challenging task that was easier said than done when looking up at the towering blonde woman, she was absolutely massive when compared to any living thing, easily as tall as the skyscraper that served as the headquarters for Queen Consolidated.

Five years ago Oliver would have jumped for the chance to climb a blonde beauty, but since then he'd learned self control and realized this was just dangerous. Felicity was as big as a mountain, one wrong move and he could easily end up flattened or squished under her body in one way or another.

Still he know that he didn't really have any other options available to him, Felicity was his best hope of getting back to normal. Oliver had to climb her body no matter the risk. Luckily for him Felicity seemed very interested in whatever she was working on, her fingers coding on the keys faster than Oliver could think.

With nowhere else to begin his climb Oliver started at Felicity's feet, using the thin overlapping materials of her footwear to greater increase his speed. Soon after he passed the arch of her foot, climbing to the top of her high heel before moving on to her legs.

As he continued to climb Oliver realized that the task was become more and more difficult, with no leg hair to grab onto Oliver was forced to use friction to maintain his grip on Felicity's bare skin. She constantly wore them, in fact Oliver couldn't remember a time where he'd seen her without one on, usually ending halfway down her thighs.

Finally he grabbed onto her skirt and thought that the rest of his climb would be a breeze, not realizing that it had already come to an end. Without warning Felicity quickly pushed back her chair and stood up, knocking Oliver off in a random direction. What happened?

Oliver arrived early on top of Laurel's apartment building for one of their secret meetings, dressed in his vigilante garb as The Hood. Having recently stopped Joseph Falk from killing Roy in a live Broadcast while in the same week crossing five names off the list left to him by his father.

Oliver put his hand over his face and rubbed his temples for a moment to clear his head, but when he lifted his head he immediately noticed that his surrounding had changed drastically. "Um Felicity, I think we have a problem." Oliver said, finding it odd as he put his hand to his ear that his earpiece had shrunk along with his body.

"Wow, a little too much information. I mean I never imagined that about you, if anything I imagined you would be above average sized. Not that I've ever thought about the size of your..." Felicity rambled before Oliver finally cut her off.

"Not what I mean. Felicity, I'm an inch tall." Oliver said, just guessing at his height based off the size of his surroundings.

“What, that’s impossible. Even if you harnessed the power of a dwarf star alloy you wouldn’t be able to shrink yourself.” Felicity said, pulling up Oliver’s location on satellite to see he wasn’t there or at the very least not visible since she could still see his location on the map through the tracker in his suit.

However what Felicity could see was the rooftop entrance to Laurel's apartment building opening up as Laurel herself walked out for her meeting with The Hood. The sight off which also largely caught Oliver's attention as the large metal door squeaked upon being opened to reveal is gigantic ex girlfriend towering overhead.

She was massive, like a skyscraper casting it's large shadow over him puny bug sized bug. She stepped out on to the roof, walking in Oliver's direction as she looked for the hood cloaked stranger.

"Felicity, I've got another problem here?" Oliver said as Laurel came stomping towards her, the closed toe high heels she wore for her job as a lawyer at CNRI threatening to crush him like a bug.

"Oliver get out of there before she steps on you!" Felicity panicked, prompting Oliver to get as far away from Laurel as possible.

"Working on it!" Oliver yelled as Laurel's foot could be seen coming down overhead, his instincts kicked in forcing him to roll backwards. A few moments later the outsole of her heel landed only an arms length away from Oliver's body, with the top piece of her heel landing at at a similar distance behind him.

"Hello? Are you up here?" Laurel's voice boomed through Oliver's ears and Felicity's earpiece. Oliver peeked out from underneath the breast of Laurel's heel, unable to see much nut the fact that her taste in underwear hadn't changed much in the last five years. Her panties were her favorite color, black with a lace trim surrounding the edges.

"Where is he?" Laurel asked herself, her eyes scanning every inch of her own rooftop, and every rooftop nearby. Every inch but the one under her feet that is.

What happens Next?

1. Laurel takes a step back and notices something on the floor beneath where she was standing. At first she thinks it's a bug, but upon closer inspection comes to realize it's actually The Hood.

2. Oliver climbs out from underneath Laurel's heel and begins scaling her body from the ground up, made more difficult when she decides to head back inside to her apartment.

Thea waited outside the door to Roy's home, wondering if he would really come back with the purse. Maybe he would just leave her standing out here all night? Little did he know what she had planned for him when he came back outside....

Finally, Roy opened the door again, bringing Thea's purse out with him. He handed her the black purse wordlessly, his face blank. As soon as she got it back, she began to search through it right in front of him.

"Don't worry, it's all there." Roy said. He didn't blame her for not trusting him, but he really hadn't taken anything.

"Oh I'm not worried about that Roy. I just need my..... Ah, I've got it." Thea said, pulling a small rectangular device out of her bag. Roy thought it looked like a taser, growing more concerned when she pointed it at him.

"Woah Thea don't do anyth-" Roy began, but Thea pushed a button before he could finish and he was startled into silence by a beam of light striking him in the chest. His view was obscured by the bright light, and when it faded he saw not Thea, but a giant black boot.

"My face is up here Roy." Thea said, grinning at the tiny man standing on the floor. He was standing just inside his apartment, but now he was barely taller than a tube of lipstick.

Roy looked up and what had happened became clear. Thea hadn't tased him, she'd shrunken him.

"What the fuck Thea? What's going on?" Roy yelled. "This isn't possible!"

"Oh don't be silly Roy. Everything is possible when you're rich." Thea said with a laugh. She bent down and snatched him off the floor of his home, before pulling the door shut. Now he was trapped outside with her, squirming in her fist.

Roy had always known that was somewhat true, but he had thought the laws of physics would have set some limits on it. As it turns out, even those were no obstacle to this giant brat. "But why shrink me?"

"There's no way I'd let you off so easily for stealing from me. I just figured that it was pointless to have you rotting in jail, when instead I could have myself a brand new little toy. I think this will be more fun for both of us." Thea said, emphasizing her point with a squeeze around his waist. Roy squealed in pain from the crushing grip of the giant rich girl's fingers. "Ooo, I didn't know you were a squeaky toy." Thea teased, laughing as she carried him over to her purse. "Now, since you like my purse so much, you can ride back inside of it." Thea said, before dropping Roy inside.

Roy landed with a thump in the bottom of the purse, crashing into the black leather that lined the bottom. He rolled over onto his back to see Thea's gigantic face looking down at him, smiling cutely. She flashed him a little wave, and then

ZIIIIIIIP

the purse was closed, leaving him in relative darkness. There was a little bit of light peeking in through the teeth of the zipper, which was enough for him to get a sense of his surroundings. There was a giant hairbrush, a tube of lipstick that was as big as he was, a giant wallet, a necklace, a pile of tampons, a pack of gum, and plenty of other random odds and ends. Before he could take further inventory, the world jumped into motion. Thea was walking back to her house, and he was along for the ride.

Thea didn't pay Roy any mind as she strolled back to her home, her purse casually swinging at her side. Her only focus was on what she would do with him when she was home. Her mind was racing with ideas, just as it had been all day. As soon as she saw him in the interrogation room at the prison she knew she wanted to own him, and now she did.

Meanwhile, Roy was tossed around the chaotic inside of the giant purse, launched into the air with every swing as he bounced along with the contents, doing his best to dodge the giant objects around him. Her lipstick rolled back and forth like a log, forcing him to jump out of the way to avoid having his feet swept out from under him. He tripped on the now chain like necklace, only to fall on top of the giant gum packet. Before he was on his feet a stray tampon had sent him flying yet again, never giving him a moment's reprieve. He was already being tormented, and she wasn't even trying yet.

------

Thea ran up to her room as soon as she got home. She could not open her purse fast enough. Her eyes darted around the inside of the purse, looking for her newest acquisition, before spotting him tangled up in her hairbrush. She stifled a giggle as she reached for him, ready to play.

"Enjoy the ride Roy?" Thea teased, pulling the shrunken boy out of the giant purse, disentangling him from the hairbrush in the process. "Don't worry, I won't ignore you any longer. We can have some fun now."

"No fucking way Thea!" Roy yelled. "I don't want to have any 'fun', this isn't a game, and I'm not a toy.
Thea responded to this with another dismissive laugh. "No Roy, you're not. I don't know why this is so hard to understand. You are MINE. I OWN you. You are my PROPERTY. Thea said, emphasizing the point. "You know, I think you parents might have made a mistake when they named you. They almost got it right, but you should never have been named Roy. They mixed up the first letter. From now on, I'm just going to call you 'Toy'. And now that I have my purse back, I have just what I need to play with you...." Thea said, reaching into her purse and pulling out....

1. A sewing kit. (Thea decides to sew Roy into the back of her thong)

2. A pack of gum. (Thea wraps Roy in a stick of mint gum and tosses him into her mouth, chewing on him lightly enough to avoid killing him)

3. A necklace. (Thea binds Roy's arms to the ends of a necklace chain, turning him into a living pendant hanging between her boobs.
