14221.content:
It was passed midnight in Starling City and Oliver was out on patrol with his new partner Roy Harper, with Felicity Smoak on their communications channel feeding them Intel about nearby crimes. "We've got a robbery at Starling City Jewels two blocks south of you, alarm was just tripped under a minute ago." Felicity said, speaking to the hood clad duo.

"Roger, let's move Roy." Oliver said, wanting to see if Roy's managed to get some form of control over the Mirakuru in his system. Saving something extra special in his quiver just in case he lost control.

"Got it." Roy said, eager to see some action as a Vigilante for the first time in nearly two weeks. He jumped from rooftop to rooftop following Oliver's lead until the sound of an alarm broke the quietness of night.

Roy jumped down into a nearby alleyway while Oliver pushed forwards, a tactic Oliver and Diggle taught him to cover extra escape avenues. He rolled forwards and noticed a man enter the lobby with a heavy looking sack hanging over his back, quickly the man noticed Roy and dropped the sack on the concrete behind him. He pulled out a gun and pointed it Roy "Why don't you just keep walking." he said, trying to sound tough as he pointed it at Roy.

In a fit of adrenaline Roy charged forward with his head ducked low, the man took a shot but it hardly slowed the endanger teen as it sparked off his shoulder and the deformed bullet fell to the floor. Roy grabbed the man and pushed him against a nearby wall, pausing for a second to look at at bullet on the ground behind him. If it wasn't for the Mirakuru in his system Roy might very well be dead, he leaned back and punched the man in the face. Following this he successfully landed multiple punches on the man's torso and stomach regions, leaving him battered and bruised as Oliver arrived on the scene after hearing the gunshot.

"Roy! Roy! Stop it Roy!" Oliver yelled, but the young man was in a violent rage. He wasn't even sure that mentioning Thea would result in him stopping this time, he reached into his quiver and pulled out a injection arrow filled with 20 milligrams of horse tranquilizer. He tailored the arrow with a higher dosage than needed for a normal human so the Mirakuru in his system wouldn't be able to keep him conscious.

Roy stood up and pulled the arrow from his back, he turned to look at Oliver and then passed out. He fell to the floor hard, lying down on his back next to the man he just ferociously assaulted. "Felicity, call your friends at S.T.A.R Labs. I think we're gonna need that project and send Diggle our location for pickup." Oliver said, speaking into his earpiece.

Hours passed before the drug wore off and Roy was slowly able to regain consciousness, as he groggily got up on his hands and knees he noticed that he was resting on top of a large wooden surface. This was odd, Oliver’s usual hideout didn’t have any large wooden surfaces this big. Where was he, where had Oliver and his team brought Roy?

“Oh good, you’re finally up.” Boomed a familiar female voice, it was one belonging to Felicity Smoak. But why was she so loud?

“I’m right here Felicity, you don’t have to use a megaphone you know.” Roy said as he stood up and turned towards Felicity, only to fall back on his ass as he was faced with her at largely different proportions than he was used to. She was gigantic, easily close to the size of the Queen Consolidated skyscraper, if not maybe a little bigger from his perspective.

Felicity pulled out her rolling chair and sat down with a bounce before rolling towards the newly shrunken Roy, who could only watch what was happening around him in utter amazement. “Sorry about your new size and all but we have to be able to keep an eye on you until Star Labs can manufacture a cure to the Miracura inside your system. Till then we just had to shrink you so that I could keep an eye on you.” Felicity stated, explaining Roy’s situation to him.

“Okay, I get taking me out of the field and everything. But why shrink me?” Roy asked, not exactly fond of being towered over so easily by the blonde IT girl.

“Because Oliver didn’t trust you to be around Thea, so he told her that you were leaving Starling City for a few weeks so she wouldn’t get suspicious.” Felicity stated, looking down at Roy as if that fact should have been obvious to him.

“That’s crazy, I would never hurt Thea!” Roy yelled.

“That’s what you said before you went out in the field about hurting bad guys, and now we have a jewel thief in critical condition at Starling General.” Felicity said, scolding Roy as she pointed her finger down at him. Clearly upset by his actions earlier that night.

“That was an accident.” Roy said, trying to defend his actions.

“And how many more accidents have to happen before someone ends up dead?” Felicity asked loudly, slamming her open palm onto the table and bringing her face in close over the shrunken teenage boy.

“I’m watching over you from now on and that’s final.” Felicity stated, clearly upset as she pulled herself back.

Just then Oliver’s voice called out over the comms chanel “Felicity, I have a truck full of weapons leaving the Glades, I need you to track it for me while I deal with these thugs.” prompting Felicity to start her new job of watching over Roy.

The only question is how she plans to do so?

1. Felicity stand up and knocks Roy onto her chair before sitting down on top of him and rolling to her computer to assist Oliver.

2. Felicity takes off her high heel and drops in on the desk next to Roy before walking off for a few seconds, telling Roy to climb inside. He would refuse to listen forcing her to drop him inside herself and put it back on with him under the ball of her foot.

3. Roy tries to run away as Felicity reaches out to grab him, however after catching him she doesn’t know where to put him. However a second call from Oliver provokes her to shove him inside her cleavage.
14221.title: Under Felicity's Care

142211.content:
"I've got to get back to work." Felicity said, no longer caring about Roy's opinion on the situation. She stood up, now towering over him. He didn't appreciate just how big she was until she stood to her full height and looked down at him, her face visible over the mountains of her breasts. While Roy was marveling at her massive scale, he didn't even notice her hand rushing towards him until he felt it strike him. He was lifted off the table by the impact, spinning and flailing as he flew helplessly through the air. He saw the edge of the table sail past him and worried he was now going to fall all the way down to the floor. He hoped the Mirakuru in his system was enough to keep him from going splat against the hard tile floor. Instead of hitting the ground though, he found himself landing on a soft leather cushion. As Roy returned to his feet, he realized he was standing not on the floor, but on Felicity's computer chair.

"Felicity! What are you doing?" Roy asked, watching the giant woman walk in front of the chair, her heels clicking ominously with each step.

"I'm teaching you a lesson." Felicity replied. "You'll be staying somewhere where you can't hurt anyone, including yourself. And you will have plenty of time to think about ways to deal with your new anger issues. And if this doesn't work, I'm sure I can think of far worse punishments." Felicity punctuated her sentence with a turn, leaving her enormous butt hanging above the shrunken boy on the seat. Her tight dress clung to her ass, outlining its contours in exquisite detail. At his tiny size, Roy could still see it vibrating as it settled from her turn, like a plate of jello that had been prodded with a spoon.

This was more than enough for Roy to get the idea. "No, Felicity, don't sit do-" Roy yelled, only to be cut off by an avalanche of the tech wiz's booty. The wall of dress covered flesh steamrolled over him effortlessly, pushing him onto his back as it settled in on top of him. As she sank deeper into her seat, it continued to come down, pushing down harder and harder on him as her cheek came down on all sides of him, creating a starfish shaped indent on her cheek where Roy was practically buried in it.

"Ahhh... Nice and comfy." Felicity teased as she felt her butt sink into her seat, her soft and fleshy right butt cheek effortlessly molding around the shrunken Roy. She could feel him squirming and fighting against it, but he was no match for even one of her tremendous cheeks. It felt good to put Roy in his place. She had liked him well enough, but the way he acted after the Mirakuru filled her with anger. This new Roy was no hero, he was a danger to everyone around him, innocent or not. He needed to be shown his place, and her butt was just the tool for the job. Either he'd shape up and learn his lesson, or she would be doing a lot of babysitting during her nights in the bunker. If his squirming under her continued to feel as good as it did, she wasn't really sure what outcome she was hoping for. "How do you like it down there Roy? Think my ass is big enough to teach you a lesson or two?"

She wanted to savor the feeling a bit, but right on cue, Oliver's voice burst into the bunker. "Felicity, I'm going to need some help here."

Springing into action, Felicity pushed off the floor with her feet, sending her wheely chair rolling up to her desk, now alert and ignoring her new seat cushion. "What's up Oliver?"

"The three Vertigo dealers are fleeing on motorcycles. Any ideas on how to catch up with them?" Oliver asked from his own, slower motorcycle. He was hot on their tail, but the gap was widening.

"Ah yes, no problem at all." Felicity said after a quick survey of the map on her screen. "They're headed right for the Star City bridge, I'll raise it just before they get there, and they'll be trapped."

They weren't the only ones Felicity had trapped tonight. And her first prisoner almost wished he had Oliver coming after him in a bike chase as opposed to Felicity's butt coming down on him with every ounce of her weight. While he had little to be grateful about, Roy was at least glad Felicity was no longer wheeling around. Her feet left the ground when she slid across the floor, focusing all her weight back onto her tremendous buttocks. Felicity was not an athletic girl, and her butt certainly demonstrated this. It was the softest thing Roy had ever come into contact with, but also completely impossible to fight. The doughy cheeks absorbed every blow or push he made against them, refusing to allow him any control whatsoever. As he futilely punched at the unimpressed wall of booty, he began to get angry. He hated being shrunken, he hated being trapped, and he hated being embarrassed to the point where he was being treated as little more than a seat cushion for the IT girl.

"Mmmm... That feels nice..." Felicity purred, loving the spot Roy was currently hitting on her hindquarters.

"Felicity, is everything alright there?" Oliver asked, breaking Felicity out of her trance as she focused on her tiny ward turned masseuse.

"Yes sorry Oliver." Felicity stammered, not wanting to explain. "Just one more second..." Felicity said, punching in some last minute keystrokes. "And... Up!"

Felicity saw the little red dots that represented the thugs on her radar slow to a stop, realizing they had nowhere to go. They were trapped at Oliver's mercy. And they weren't the only ones. With a satisfied grin, she slid her butt to the side, rolling Roy from his position under her cheek to right under her crack. She gave her cheeks a squeeze around him, asserting her complete and total power over her prisoner.

This was not a small action for Roy. He was used to Felicity moving around on top of him, but this was a big movement, even for this gigantic ass. Rather than move back and forth, Felicity's cheek continuously slid to the right, dragging across his body until he was rolling over and over, like a log rolling downhill. He came to a stop on his back once more, just in time to see her ass settle back down on to him, one cheek on either side. This was actually much better than being pinned under a cheek, as much less of her weight was on him now. That is until she began to squeeze her cheeks together. The dress clad cheeks moved in on him from either side, determined to meet each other regardless of Roy's intentions. Even with his Mirakuru strength, he posed no obstacle to them. They easily overwhelmed any resistance and slammed together tightly, pinning him between them.

Felicity had no concept of what it must be like for Roy as she squeezed him between her cheeks. She imagined it might be something like a very tight hug. She knew it was a punishment, but she had no concept of just how strong her clenching cheeks could be. If she had fully appreciated it, it only would have made her grin wider. She loved being in control for once. She sometimes felt like she wasn't useful enough, sitting in the bunker and waiting for Oliver to need her. But now she was tackling a problem all on her own, one Oliver was not equipped to deal with. And all it took her was a clench of her ass cheeks. As she watched the red dots getting picked off on the screen, taken out one by one by Oliver's arrows, she fought her own battle. With every dot that disappeared, she gave her cheeks another powerful clench, squeezing her prisoner as tightly as she could. She only wished she could feel him directly against her skin.

They were not hugs for Roy. Every squeeze felt like an attempt to push his organs out through his mouth like squeezing toothpaste out of a tube. If it wasn't for the Mirakuru, he was sure that he'd been a red splotch on her dress. He was seriously considering rolling back under her butt cheek next time she adjusted herself if only to ensure that he was only at the mercy of one of her ass cheeks at a time.

"Thanks Felicity. I'm all done here. Did you handle the Roy situation?" Oliver radioed.

"Don't worry Oliver, I've got Roy covered. I thought he might be a pain in the ass, but he actually has been great." Felicity said, nearly giggling at her double entendre. No one but her knew Roy was "covered" by her enormous booty.

"Alright, I'm going to head home then. See you tomorrow." Oliver said, and the radio went silent, leaving Felicity and Roy alone in the bunker. It was getting late, and she should probably head home as well, but she had to figure out what to do with Roy. It's not like she could wheel this chair home with him pinned under her butt the whole way, much as she may have liked to. With a sigh, she accepted that she'd have to get up and slowly rose to her feet.

"Alright my little cushion, it's time for me to go home." Felicity said, chuckling at the sight of the tiny boy gasping for breath in the crater-like indent left by her ass on the seat. "The only question is, where should I keep you?"

1. Felicity decides she ready misses her little Roy butt massages, and decides to stuff him between her butt cheeks as she heads home.

3. Felicity traps Roy in one of the equipment cases with Sara's Black Canary costume. The only problem is when she shows up and slips into her costume unaware of her tiny guest.

142322.content:
There's no direct scene this is adapting, but here's a video of drunk Laurel and also Thea at Verdant: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fYzwxxgj...

"Last call!" The bartender shouted, louder than necessary. In truth, there was only one person still sitting at the Verdant bar. That person was Laurel Lance, attorney at law. And she was drunk.

"I'll take a shot of whiskey. Like to end my night on the hard stuff." Laurel garbled, waving pointlessly at the female bartender. Sighing, the bartender poured the shot and slid it down to her, just in time for Thea to enter the room.

"Don't you think you've had enough Laurel?" Thea asked, walking up behind the bar. She was wearing a tight blue dress and giving Laurel a disappointed look. She turned to the bartender who had given her the drink. "Go home Maria, I've got this one."

Not wanting to anger her boss, the bartender politely waved before scurrying out of the room, leaving Thea and Laurel alone.

"I'm old enough to know when I've had enough Thea." Laurel said, staring at the shot glass on the bar in front of her.

"We both know that's not true Laurel." Thea said, sighing. "You know we're just worried about you."

"I don't need you to worry about me!" Laurel snapped, glaring at Thea.

"I know that Laurel, I just care about you." Thea said with a sigh. "Ok look, I'm not going to force you, but I've got to go turn off the lights in the back. Just wait here and skip that drink, and I'll walk you home, ok?" Thea said, giving a faint smile.

Laurel glared at her with crossed arms, not saying anything. Sighing again, Thea walked away, quietly hoping that Laurel would come to her senses. Laurel scoffed, unable to believe she was getting lectured about drinking by Thea Queen. Thea had been a notorious party girl just a year ago. Now Thea was running a club, and Laurel was on the verge of getting disbarred. How had things changed so much so quickly? It was no wonder she wanted to drink more.

Laurel sighed and reached for her shot, not giving another thought to Thea's scolding. But as soon as she touched, the glass, the world started to blur. Well, it was already blurry, but it quickly got much worse. Laurel pulled her hand away and grabbed her head, covering her eyes to give her brain sometime to readjust. Then suddenly, she felt like she was falling. This was a familiar feeling for the drunken girl, but this time seemed different. When she opened her eyes, she realized why: she really was falling! She flailed helplessly as she plummeted downwards, trying to find something to stop her descent. She braced herself for what she was sure would be a painful landing, before....

PLOP

Laurel suddenly found herself underwater. She was sure she had to be hallucinating at this point, but her survival instincts kicked in regardless. Frantically, she began to swim towards light, surprised by the dark murky color of whatever water she had landed in.

"Agh" Laurel gasped as she popped her head above the surface, gasping in air. Now that she could breathe and was no longer worried about drowning, her other senses immediately kicked in. First was the cold. Whatever she landed in was frigid, and she started shivering right away. Second was the overpowering smell of alcohol. And there was the glass wall surrounding her pool, distorting her view of Verdant.

"Oh my god, I'm in my drink" Laurel yelled. She had no idea how it had happened, but somehow she had shrunken and fallen into the shot glass that had been sitting in front of her. She immediately swam to the side of the glass, trying to climb out, but the slick glass walls proved too smooth a surface to climb. She was going to need Thea's help to get out of this, assuming Thea was still normal sized.

"Laurel? Are you still here? Laurel?" Thea called strolling back towards the bar and wondering where her friend had gone. She would have had to move quite fast to disappear so quickly, which was surprising considering how drunk she was.

"I'm down here!" Laurel yelled. "In the drink!" Her head still hurt a little bit, but falling into the cold liquid had helped her sober up considerably. Looking up at a giant Thea also helped with that. Her ex boyfriend's little sister was now a giantess towering over her, and Laurel really needed her help.

Thea came around the bar, looking around at where Laurel had been sitting. Her eyes scanned the bar itself, before settling on the shot glass in which Laurel had landed.

Laurel sighed with relief, assuming she had been seen. Thea was looking right at her! Her hopes were dashed when Thea spoke next.

"She left her drink at least. That's a good sign I guess." Thea said, sitting down on the bar stool Laurel had been at.

Laurel was stunned at just how massive Thea was. Even sitting down, the giant club owner completely dwarfed Laurel. Thea's face hung far above her, no longer looking at the drink, but staring off into space.

"Ugh, what are we going to do about Laurel. She's spiraling out of control." Thea groaned, completely at a loss. She hated seeing her friend like this, but didn't know what to do to help. She laid her head on her hand, looking dejectedly downwards at the shot they'd gotten into a fight over.

"Well, no use wasting a drink." Thea muttered, before grabbing the shot glass off the bar with no regard for its tiny passenger.

Laurel's eyes widened as even her drunk mind realized what was about to happen. "Thea no! Don't drink it I'm in here!" Laurel yelled, waving one arm frantically while using the other to stay afloat. If Thea didn't see her, she was a goner.

What happens?

1. A bartender accidentally turns off the lights and startles Thea, causing her to spill the drink down her shirt. She heads home to shower, annoyed and unaware of the tiny drunk woman now struggling between her tits.

2. Thea brings the glass up to her lips but notices Laurel just before drinking it. Seeing that she is tiny now, Thea decides to help Laurel break her drinking habit, keeping her tiny as a form of rehab.

3. Thea doesn't notice Laurel and downs the shot with Laurel inside. Laurel is swallowed and digested.

She needed to find a way to get Thea's attention, but she had no idea how, not helped by the still drunk woman feeling queezy as her surroundings shook like jello with every move Thea made, only the stickiness of the alcohol stopping her from being thrown into the younger woman's cleavage, or bouncing off and plummeting to the ground and her death.

Thea sighs as she returns home, Laurel was a problem she really wished she didn't have, as it hurt her to see someone who had helped her less than a year ago going as far down the rabbit hole as she had, actually further if she was being honest. But that was something for another day, right now she needed to get these clothes off her, take a hot shower to get this booze off her skin and just go to bed, where things made sense.

What next?

1)While getting out of her clothes, Laurel is rubbed off and falls into Thea's bra, which she leaves on her bed before heading to her shower. While she does avoid potential drowning, she does need to get out of Speedy's bra before she puts it in the wash, not exactly something an inch tall drunk girl can do easily
2) Laurel ends up an unwilling addition to Thea's shower routine, the water shocking her sober while also washing her off Thea's boob in a matter of seconds. Her tiny size seems to have made fall damage non existent, which means she just had to somehow avoid being washed into the drain, something made easier when she ended up wedged between Thea's 4th and pinkie toes
3) Laurel's alcohol idled brain decides the simplest way to survive this nightmare and get Thea's attention... was to bite her. It sort of worked, as besides getting a slap that felt like she was run into by a car, little Laurel had Thea's undivided attention, as the bug who had the balls to bite her on the tit.
1423221.title: Diving Into Thea's Tits

1423223.content:
Laurel tried to fight the current, despite waves of whiskey splashing back over her from the rim of the glass as Thea lifted the shot to chest level. Able to view the former party girl's ample tits through her revealing dress, each one of her boobs able to compensate the space of Laurel's entire apartment.

"Thea, Thea, listen to me, please! Don't swallow me! Thea?" Laurel yelled, so small she couldn't be heard even when she was less than a foot away from Thea's eardrums, losing hope that things were going to go her way.

"Well, bottoms up," Thea announced, rushing the shot towards her lips and throwing her head back, washing Laurel alongside the edge of the glass. Screaming incoherently as her Ex-Boyfriend's little sister prepared to swallow her alive, rushing toward's Thea's upper lip.

Her upper body collided with Thea's front teeth, nearly rendering her unconscious as she flipped upside down, landing on the tip of Thea's tongue. The rest of the shot attacking Laurel in a wave while she was reeling from the impact, washing the Lawyer's tiny body down the length of Thea's tongue, attempting to grab onto anything that would save her life.

Thea failed to notice these feeble struggles, gulped back the Alcohol, drawing Laurel closer to her doom, unknowingly enjoying the flavor she added. "No, Thea, please, you can't!" were the last words the tiny woman would ever speak outside the comfort of Thea's belly, carried away by the current of alcohol to the back of Thea's mouth, and down her throat.

Screaming helplessly, Laurel continued to fight back the entire way down Thea's esophagus, kicking and punching the walls as they closed in around her. Thea, feeling a catch in her throat, forced down the lump with an additional gulp, pinning Laurel's arms over her head and dropping her into Thea's stomach.

"Thea, oh my god, no! Let me out of here! THHEEEEEAA!" Laurel screamed, floating in Thea's stomach acid, which had already begun to eat away at her clothes and burn her skin. Meanwhile, outside Thea's belly, the short-haired brunette had turned over the empty shot glass and left it on the bar to clean tomorrow, patting her abdomen and shaking things up for Laurel in the process.

"Ah, that was smooth. I've got to ask Maria what kind of whiskey that was tomorrow so I can have another." Thea declared, exiting her club and heading home where her vibrator would be waiting to be her to a thrilling climax.

---2 days later---

"Search parties are now confirming that Laurel Lance is still considered missing, she was last seen at Verdant, a popular club in the Glades owned by Thea Queen. We'll have more on this story as it develops." the news station reported as Thea rolled out of bed, walking to get dressed in a T-shirt and panties when she noticed her ass in the mirror.

For reasons she couldn't quite explain it seemed larger today, a welcomed improvement upon her already sexy physique, giving herself a nice slap on the ass before carrying on with her day. As for Laurel Lance, she was never seen or heard from again, and nobody ever discovered what truly happened to her, not even Thea. Reduced to an extra lump of fat on the rich girl's behind.
1423223.title: Swallowed in a Shot

Who will Shrink?

1431.content:
How would you like to see Oliver shrunk?

1. Nyssa Al Ghul shrinks Oliver as Punishment for concealing the identity of Sara's killer using a toxin developed by the league of Assassins to torture and crush their enemies.

2. While attempting to interrogate Thea about Malcolm Merlyn's whereabouts Oliver is shrunk by a security system in her apartment, leaving him shrunk at his sister's mercy with only his various arrows to defend himself against her.
1431.title: Arrow Season 3: Oliver Shrinks

14312.content:
While searching for leads on Sara's killer Oliver and his team happen upon evidence that supports that Thea might be the one responsible for her death. After discovering Malcolm Merlin returned to Star City with Thea around the time of their friends' death Diggle, Felicity, and Roy convince Oliver to ask Thea again where Malcolm Merlin was, this time as the Arrow.

Later in the night, he got into position on the rooftop overlooking Thea's apartment. From there he saw her, decorating for the holiday season. She looked so peaceful as she walked across the room, how could anyone believe that she was capable of killing Sara? But whether he liked the situation or not, Oliver knew what he had to do.

He grabbed an arrow from his quiver, drawing it against the back of his bow before lowering it down to the arrow rest. In one fluid motion, Oliver released the nock of his arrow, allowing it to soar silently across the street. It pierced the bricks above her balcony door, creating a clotheslined cable for Oliver to zip line across.

Oliver jumped, latching onto the cable and swinging towards Thea's apartment. He had to know the truth about Thea's potential involvement in this, even if that meant interrogating her himself. A few moments later, he kicked his way through her balcony's glass door. Oliver faced his sister as an intruder, Thea still having no idea that her brother was the Arrow.

"Thea Queen! Where is Malcolm Mer-" Oliver started, but before he could finish his sentence a bright flash of light surrounded him on both his right and left sides. A security system installed by Merlin in case any of the League's members came after Thea. However, this security system utilized a prototype Molecular Hyper Compressor that Malcolm had stolen from Palmer Technologies. Which meant that its purpose was not to kill intruders, but instead leave them helpless in front of Thea, that way she could dispose of them herself. Oliver was about to get a firsthand experience of what that meant exactly.

*Boom, Boom!*

The ground beneath Olivers feet shock as he rubbed his eyes, his retinas still burning after being exposed to the white-hot light. 'What the hell is going on?' he asked himself. What could be causing these sudden earthquakes? Was this Malcolm's doing as well? Another part of his security system? Oliver's mind was racing with the possibilities, his vision beginning to return. But what he saw first defied all logic, it was his little sister Thea only 60 times bigger than she was a few moments ago.

*BOOM, BOOM!*

Thea's bare feet met with the wooden floor below on either side of Oliver's tiny body, blocking off his escape. Somehow he'd been shrunk. Looking up Oliver could see that something inside Thea had changed. Her eyes were different. They used to be so sweet and calm, but now they were focused and angry.

"Thought you could intimidate me huh? Thought I'd be some scared little girl? Well let me ask you something, do I look 'little' to you?" Thea asked, raising her left foot off the ground and stomping it back down on the ground with a thundering slap.

*BOOM!*

"Oliver! What's going on? I'm picking up some weird telemetry from your suit. Is everything okay?" asked a familiar voice in Oliver's earpiece, it was Felicity Smoak. Luckily all of his gear had shrunk with him.

"Not a great time Felicity! Thea's three hundred feet tall, I've been shrunk!" Oliver replied while waiting for Thea to make the next move.

"Wait, shrunk as in 'Honey I Shrunk the Kids' shrunk? That's not possible unless Merlin got his hands on a Dwarf Star alloy, but that's some seriously cutting-edge tech. Where would he even find that?" Felicity commented, geeking out while Oliver stared down (or rather up at) his gargantuan sibling.

"Yes! I need your help. Find some way of distracting her so I can escape." Oliver said, relying on Felicity's help.

"I can't! Merlin must have taken the entire building of the grid. You're on your own Oliver. You have to run, now!" Felicity yelled.

Meanwhile, Thea was preparing to end her tiny intruder's live. Raising her foot high above him, wiggling her naked toes, actually enjoying the power she felt over someone as small as an insect. "Don't take this the wrong way. But, I have to kill you now." Thea announced, bringing her foot down hard.

*BOOM!*

Her foot landed right where Oliver had been standing. Luckily, he had just enough time to evade her foot before the impact. "Don't run away! I can't guarantee a quicker death like that." Thea teased, her personality pulling a complete one-eighty from what Oliver was accustomed to seeing from her.

"Felicity, do something!" Oliver yelled as he squared off for round two, noticing that he lost his earpiece while evading Thea's feet. With only his bow and his wits at his disposal, he'd have to survive.

He grabbed another bow from his quiver and began running away from Thea. "What's wrong, are you scared?" she teased, lifting her foot again, it's shadow eclipsing his tiny form in mere seconds. "Come back here! I want to introduce you to my toes." Thea teased, actually enjoying this.

Oliver waited until the shadow of Thea's foot stopped growing and used the cover to shoot an arrow through the gap between her big and second toe. The arrow pierced Thea's pants at her thigh, giving Oliver a grappling point. Activating his bow's automatic winch system, he evaded Thea's foot a second time. None of which meant he was anymore safe as Thea quickly noticed his deception.

She swung down towards her thigh, not aiming for Oliver himself but the rope holding him up instead. She was attempting to make the Arrow her own personal Yo-Yo, grabbing the string and pulling it hard. This action launched Oliver into the sky and up the full length of her body, leaving him to fall back down from her head all the way down to her toes.

However, Thea would never allow it to get that far. Rather than give her tiny opponent the chance to escape certain death a third time she decided to try and end things quickly. She stretched her arms out far to her right and left sides, then brought her hands together aiming for Oliver. Trying to squash him as if he was an annoying mosquito between the palms of her hands.

Oliver saw this ahead of time, grabbing several arrows from his quiver this time. He drew them against his bow, not seeing the need to steady them with such a large target. He released his grip and allowed them to dig into Thea's palm "Ouch!" Thea said, the arrows inflicting just enough damage to get her to pull back. But the other hand was still coming and smacked Oliver across the room.

He landed in Thea's kitchen, on the center of the island. "Little fucker, you're gonna pay for that one!" Thea shouted, surprised that someone so small could make her that upset. Killing him was no longer her intent. Instead, she was going to torture him until he wished for death, turning her attention towards the island.

Oliver took notice of this. Realizing that he was no closer to escaping the brunt of Thea's wrath than he was getting back to his original size. She stomped towards the island, her feet creating shockwaves that could be felt by Oliver even at a distance.

*Boom, boom, boom!*

"Okay, you've seriously pissed me off now you little worm!" Thea snapped, raising her hand over the counter. Oliver, dealing with some potentially broken ribs struggled to stand and run away. She'd failed to crush the Arrow as if he were a cockroach and a mosquito. Now she was going to try smushing him like an ant on her kitchen counter.

*Slap!*

Oliver stumbled away, escaping between Thea's fingers as her hand met with the countertop. Though for once Thea had let him escape death, moving him into position for her plans. She watched from above as he ran across the island, both of them realizing it was a futile effort. She laughed, raising her hand once more, high above the counter.

*Bang*

Thea's hand slammed against the counter, her palm facing Oliver. Slowly she started moving her hand towards him like a bulldozer. He tried to run. But unlike the other times, there was no escape for him at this size. Thea was too powerful at her gigantic size, leaving Oliver with no remaining options to fight against her. Escape was impossible, but much to Oliver's surprise Thea didn't crush him then and there. Instead, she swung her hand over him and _________.

1) ...Swatted him like a fly, setting him on course to land inside one of her knee tall designer boots. Meanwhile, Felicity listens in on Oliver's lost communicator. Potentially coming up with a plan to save Oliver while Thea puts on the boot with Oliver inside.

2) ...Sends him flying onto her couch, where she is quick to introduce him to her ass. Sitting on top of him and using Oliver as a seat cushion as recompense for leaving a hole in her pants.

3) ...Grabs him, bringing him under her gaze without unmasking him. Thinking about the many different ways in which she can torture him. (Writers Choice)
14312.title: Arrow vs Speedy

143121.content:
Oliver fully expected his sister's hand to come down on him like a fly swatter, flattening him into a smear on the counter. Instead, he was relieved to instead take a hit from the side, sending him off of the counter entirely. As he flew through the air, dazed and confused, he fumbled for his bow, hoping to find a grappling arrow to save him from colliding into the hard apartment floor. There weren't any. Panicking, he realized there was nothing he could do to control his trajectory. Looking down, he hoped to see himself headed for a soft landing, like the couch or a plant. Instead, he saw something that might have been worse than the floor: the opening to his sister's boot. Unable to redirect his path in any way, he could do nothing but plummet headfirst into the beckoning boot, belly flopping into the inside with a quiet squelching noise as his impact squeezed some lingering sweat out of it.

"Bullseye," Thea said to herself, smirking as she headed towards her waiting boot. Unknowingly, Oliver's dropped communicator was laying on the floor, right in her path. And Felicity was still trying to use it in vain.

"Oliver? Oliver! Come in Oliver!" Felicity yelled, trying to find any sign that Oliver was nearby.

All she heard in response was Thea's stomping feet, getting closer and closer. She could hear the slam as the ball of her foot struck the ground, plus the little auxiliary taps as her toes struck down. Thea was a thin girl, walking barefoot. The thought that her footsteps could cause earthquakes like that made Felicity realize just how truly tiny Oliver must be. Felicity couldn't help but cringe as the feet got closer, fully expecting to hear a crunch as the communicator was snuffed out of existence. But luckily, Thea narrowly missed the discarded device, allowing Felicity to hear what came next.

"So how do you like it in my boot little Arrow?" Thea said, getting closer now to the boots that were imprisoning Star City's superhero. "They're probably a little smelly. I've been wearing them all day for pretty much the whole week."

As Oliver laid on his stomach, face down on the insole of his sister's giant boot, he fully believed they had been well worn. The cave he found himself in reeked of foot sweat. He groaned in pain as he pushed himself up on to his knees. He patted his chest, ensuring no ribs had broken on the impact. Like it or not, his sister's boot had decent padding. He could feel the insole beneath him vibrating though, in time with the echoing thumps of his sister's footsteps from outside.

"If you think it's bad now, wait till I put them on. You're going to have to wrestle my toes just to find some living space." Thea said with a laugh.

He knew she was getting close but had no idea what to do next. He turned to the opening of the boot, knowing it was the only escape and could see one of Thea's lamps, like a shining beacon saying "Freedom this way." But as he pondered how to actually reach that high above the opening, Thea's face suddenly appeared over the opening. Her head obscured much of the light Oliver had been getting, leaving him only able to see a dimly illuminated version of her cruelly grinning face.

Oliver fell back in surprise as his little sister's face suddenly appeared over the boot, grinning madly down at him. "Oh wow, I can barely see you in there. I wonder if I'll even be able to feel you under my foot." Thea teased, loving the power rush. Her words echoed inside the boot, nearly deafening Oliver.

"Let me out of here right now Thea!" Oliver yelled, still unwilling to reveal his identity to his sister.

"What's that? You're scared of a little girl's feet? Well then maybe you shouldn't go breaking into people's apartments. Luckily, I think we can help you get past your fear with a little exposure therapy." Thea said, before standing up to her full height. Her face was now seemingly two hundred feet over the boot opening, making it clear just how tiny Oliver really was. And yet none of that compared to the sight of her bare foot appearing over him, toes wiggling excitedly as they hung over the entrance to the boot. They were ready to play with their new toy.

Oliver began to run as his sister's toes began their descent, like a stampede coming right for him. Unfortunately, Thea anticipated this and tipped her shoe back as she slid the boot on. As she did, Oliver's run went from flat, to uphill, to a full-on climb. And without anything to grip on the smooth insole of the boot, he found himself sliding helplessly down towards the incoming avalanche of wiggling toes.

His descent only stopped when the ball of her foot touched down right in his path as her toes arced up over him. When her foot settled in, he was trapped face down against the insole of her shoe while her giant toes kept him restrained. He tried to push himself up off the disgusting ground, but her toes forced him back down with an effortless flex. There were five fleshy arches built around him, creating an unliftable ceiling of sisterly foot flesh.

"Ooooh, you feel good under my toes little guy," Thea said, smiling as she felt the weak squirming beneath her toes. "I wonder how long you can hold up under there though?" She had sat down on the couch to pull her boot on, but now was the moment of truth. She rose to her feet, allowing her weight to roll from her heels, to the balls of her feet, and finally to her toes.

Oliver shouted as his sister's toes tightened their grip, but his only audience was the cruel digits inflicting his torture. He felt he weight bearing down on him more now, and saw the ball of her foot on his left sink down into the insole, leaving no visible space between them. He was glad he hadn't ended up under there, not sure if he could survive his sister's full weight.

Satisfied that the screaming meant he was still alive, Thea took a few trial steps across her apartment, gingerly at first, but when she was convinced that he could take it, she began to walk normally.

Nothing about the situation was normal for Oliver though. Every one of his sister's footfalls was an event to him. Every smack of her foot against the ground felt like a tidal wave slamming him into a rocky cliff. Except with the foot, the wave didn't stop. Once he was up against the insole wall, it didn't fall away. It pressed and pressed as hard as it could, trying to flatten him and squeeze him and destroy him. As her foot pressed into him, he was glad he wasn't any smaller. If he had been small enough, a stomp of her foot could have pushed him into a pore on her sole, dooming him to a life as the underside of a foot.

As Thea walked across the apartment, 100% of her focus was on her new toe toy. She didn't even notice the communicator she stepped on, eradicating it from existence with a barely audible crunch.

Felicity heard the crunch loud and clear, followed by static as the communicator went offline. She could not believe what she had just heard. Oliver was trapped in his sister's boot, being used as an insole for the young girl. At least she knew he was alive by the way Thea had been talking to him. She had to go save him, and fast. Who knows what Thea would do if she got bored with playing with him under her toes. Felicity immediately hopped out of her chair and headed to the elevator, wanting to catch Thea as soon as possible.

Meanwhile, Thea was still enjoying her new foot toy. Gleefully, she squeezed him with her toes and lifted her foot a bit inside her shoe, pushing him forward all the way up to the toe of her boot. This wasn't her taking pity on him though. She just wanted to be able to play with him a bit more dexterously.

Oliver was relieved for a moment to have been pushed forward, thinking he'd have less of his sister's weight to contend with. That is until his sister's toes sprang into action. Now that he was at the toe of her boot, the pads of her toes were upon him. His head was right under her big toe, which wasted no time pressing down on his face. He felt the calloused underside of her toe scrape across his face as it literally rubbed in just how completely she dominated her new boot pet.

"I like how your little face feels under my toe. If you don't get squished tonight, maybe I'll have you give me a foot rub in the morning. Your little body could hit so many sore spots." Thea teased.

Just when Oliver felt like the pressure of her toe was going to break his nose, Thea relented, just before her talon-like toes reclaimed his body and pulled him back under them, snug under their arches where he belonged.

"The only question now is what you and I should do together next?"

What happens?

1. Thea lounges around her apartment, toying with Oliver under her toes until Felicity drops in. (Reserved)

2. Thea heads out to Verdant for some working and dancing, confident her new insole will support her.

3. Thea takes Oliver out of her boot, trying to decide what to do next. When Felicity arrives, she places him on a chair and allows Felicity to unknowingly sit on him.
143121.title: Oliver Gets The Boot

Ray somehow ending up either stuck to her foot or ending up inside of her footwear before she puts it out to patrol the city.
14431.title: Ray Palmer Shrinks

choices: Night On The Town With Felicity's Butt
144311.content:
Back when Ray was still perfecting the shrinking process, there was still a few 'bugs' to work out in his live trials. However, like all of Ray Palmer's problems, he tackled the issues head-on. A fact that often got him into trouble as the world was dangerous for a man the size of a Tic-Tac. Welcome to the Behind the scenes story of how Ray Palmer survived his encounter with the ass of one Felicity Smoak.


"This is Raymond Palmer, conducting miniaturization test number 17. Shrinking myself and the A.T.O.M or Atom suit, short for Advanced Technology Operating Mechanism." Ray announced, recording his work in Team Arrow's new secret hideout.

"Simulations predict a fifty-two percent chance of success, with only a one percent chance that I will be shrunk out of existence entirely." Ray joked, placing his finger over controls. "Miniaturization in three, two, one... *Click*." Ray declared, activating his suit before shrinking rapidly.

"Whoa!" Ray yelled as his body was tossed into the air, the shrinking process reducing his body to the center of mass in his abdomen. Something he made a note of to fix in the future as a tall and surprisingly soft structure broke his fall.

Ray stood up after taking the plunge, looking at his massive surroundings and jumping joyfully at his success. Sure his landing could use a little work, but he could finally shrink himself at will. However, Ray would soon come to realize that shrinking wasn't the only problem he'd tackle today as he tried returning to his former size.

"Okay, going up in 3, 2, 1...*Click*." Ray said, closing his eyes for the regrowth process. However nothing changed, Ray remained tiny. He looked at his control panel to see that it read "CRITICAL ERROR! Not enough power remaining for this function." realizing that he forgot to charge the suit before his test in his excitement.

*Ding*

Suddenly the silence was broken by the sound of the Elevator stopping on this floor, the doors opening to reveal an absolutely gargantuan Felicity Smoak. She was carrying in one hand a bag from Big Belly Burger, and in the other her purse. The rhythmic sound of her heels clicking against the floor drawing closer by the second. The Vibrations caused by her feet, creating small tremors that made Ray's legs wobble as she came up the stairs, heading straight for him.

She was wearing a pink pastel dress, with a mini skirt that flowed around her halfway down her thighs. Her steps occasionally granting Ray a glimpse of her black panties as she walked around the Arrow Cave.

Up close, her size was even more impressive and intimidating. Felicity was like a living, breathing skyscraper, who's height rivaled Palmer Technologies. Even the tall structure he landed on only came up to the blonde CEO's thighs, making him wonder what he was standing on exactly. Turning to his right to see a wall one hundred feet high, made of the same material under his feet.

Finally, it occurred to Ray that he was standing on top of a chair. More importantly, one designed specifically to comfort Felicity's wide hips. The ground pulled out from underneath him as the giant woman casually pulled out her chair for use, placing her purse next to her keyboard.

Ray fell onto his back, watching as Felicity swung her giant ass overhead. Unable to waste any power on an escape attempt, Ray called out to Felicity for help. "Felicity wait! Don't sit down, I'm down here!" Ray yelled, waving his arms as his cries for help went unnoticed.

"Ugh, I should really kick my addiction to Big Belly Burger one of these days. This is gonna go straight to my hips, again." Felicity joked, abruptly bringing her shapely rear end down onto her seat without even thinking to check her cushion. Her large moon blocking out all light, her shadow eclipsing Ray's tiny body within moments as he futile put his hands up to defend himself.

*Thump*

Felicity's butt landed on top of the tiny Ray with the earth-shattering force of a falling meteor. Bouncing on top of him as she failed to notice anything out of the ordinary under her panty clad bottom, despite Ray's struggles underneath her. She weighed so much that Ray was surprised that he was still alive, though he probably had Felicity's rotund rear end to thank for that.

"Okay, let's get to work," Felicity said to herself, sitting up in her seat, pushing Ray down with her full weight. From a scientific standpoint, Ray couldn't help but feel proud of his work. If he could survive under Felicity's giant butt while he was the size of a skittle, then there was probably little that could harm or kill him.

Meanwhile, Ray's camera was there, recording the whole thing, zooming in on Felicity's butt while following his suit's tracker.

What happens next?

1. Felicity notices the camera zooming in on her and gets up to check the footage, leaving Ray in the imprint left behind by her butt.

2. Ray wastes some of his suit's remaining power trying to get Felicity's attention through different means, such as attacking her, trying to lift her and so on.

3. Felicity gets up an hour later, her panties dragging Ray into her buttcrack and forming a wedgie with him at its center. Felicity then heads home with Ray in tow.
144311.title: Felicity's Rear Smother's a Tiny Ray

14432.content:
Lazarus Pit Thea problems here we go...

144322.content:
Thea woke up in a daze, unsure of where she was. She didn't even remember falling asleep. She had been in the bunker, arguing with Oliver, and then she'd felt a prick on the back of her neck. After that, it was all fuzzy...

As her her head cleared, she realized she was not laying down. She was vertical, held up by some thick and unfamiliar restraints that wrapped around her entire body up to her neck.

"Good, you're awake." Laurel said.

The sound of Laurel's voice gave Thea a jolt. It was loud, and coming from above her. She craned her head upwards towards the source of the voice, and was shocked to see only Laurel's enormous face hanging above her. As she scanned the giant woman, she realized that the "restraints" that were holding her were Laurel's fingers. She was trapped in Laurel's fist, with only head sticking out.

"What's going on Laurel? Why am I so small?" Thea asked, struggling against Laurel's giant fingers. Her struggling didn't move the fingers surrounding her body at all though.

Laurel tried to answer delicately, knowing that Thea wouldn't like the answer. "Well Thea, the team decided that you've been out of control recently. Your bloodlust is making you dangerous and unpredictable."

"So you shrunk me?" Thea asked angrily.

"Not me. It was Felicity." Laurel said. "But we all agreed that as long as you can't control your own actions, it was necessary."

"That's bullshit Laurel! I'm 100% in control of my actions!" Thea snarled, her rage building. "Put me down and I'll show you!"

"We both know that's not true Thea." Laurel said.

"So what, you're just going to be my babysitter now?" Thea asked.

"No, no, it's not like that..." Laurel replied, trying to calm her down. Trying to extend an olive branch, she placed Thea down on the desk in front of her before continuing to speak. "You'll just have to stay with me for now while Oliver and Felicity look into ways to cure your blood lust."

"I'm not staying with you Laurel! How would that even work? You're going to bring your tiny friend to work?" Thea yelled angrily. "Might get a few questions about that."

Laurel almost cursed under her breath. To be honest, she did feel like a babysitter, stuck with this angry petulant girl, even if she was tiny. "Obviously I couldn't let people see you Thea. You'd have to stay hidden somewhere in my clothes."

"No way!" Thea said, backing away from Laurel's hands. Before Laurel could do anything to stop her, the tiny girl drew the bow off her back and quickly fired an arrow into the giant DA's hand.

"Ow!" Laurel said, feeling the pinprick of the Arrow stab into her hand. "Fuck Thea, this is the kind of shit I'm talking about." Laurel was no longer playing nice.

Thea saw the change on Laurel's face and knew she had overdone it. She turned to run from the giant superhero, only to feel the familiar giant fingers wrapping around her again. This time Laurel's fingers came only up to her waist, covering her legs and holding her arms down at her sides.

Laurel flicked the tiny bow and arrow off Thea's back as the tiny girl angrily writhed in her grip, yelling with rage as she fought the giant fingers. "Now I'm sure shrinking you was the right choice. You can't stay calm for a second! I was just going to keep you in my pocket, but it's clear that you can't be trusted with that much freedom. You need a time out to cool off, and I know just the spot...."

Where is Laurel going, and where will she keep Thea?

2. It's night time and Laurel is going to go out as Black Canary, with Thea trapped in her boot under her foot.

Kate awoke confused, as she didn't remember falling asleep. Her head was spinning, which immediately set her on alert. She suspected she had been drugged. "Yup! I slipped a little of that shrinking potion into your drink earlier. I took the label off though. I know how you love surprises." Alice said with a sneer. "And now that you're tiny, I don't have to worry about Batwoman getting in the way of my plans." Alice explained.

info.brief_description: A shrinking fetish story based on the DC comics TV shows shown on the CW.
info.description:
The series currently airing on the CW are as follows, Arrow(7 seasons completed), The Flash(5 seasons completed), DC's Legends of Tomorrow(4 seasons completed), Supergirl(4 seasons completed), Black Lightning(2 seasons completed), and Batwoman(1st season ongoing) also be sure to check the story outline for the Zero story additions which will exclusively cover crossovers between the shows which are all connected.

Some ground rules include: Keeping additions over a certain character length, avoiding non-canon ships of characters, Scat and Toilet content will be immediately deleted upon my notice.
